title: Social Worker
description:
**This job is in Ireland - you must be fluent in English - we can only accept applications from fully qualified social workers who are willing to relocate to Ireland - we will coordinate all visas, work permits etc**


GS International Recruitment is looking for a highly skilled and experienced Social Care Worker who will work with children/ young people, families and/ or significant others, Social Work teams, other healthcare providers agencies, schools, training agencies and community groups.


The Social Care Worker will care for, protect, and support vulnerable or dependent clients, individually or in groups, in conjunction with the wider multidisciplinary team and other relevant agencies. She/ he will ensure the welfare of those under his/ her care and will act as an advocate as appropriate.


The Social Care Worker will contribute to the planning and evaluation of individualised and group programmes of care, which are based on needs, identified in consultation with the client and others and delivered through day-to-day shared life experiences.


Within the Residential and Special Care Setting , the Social Care Worker will work as part of a team to provide a safe, caring environment for resident children/ young people with the primary aim of providing the intervention necessary to address the issues that are preventing them from living at home or in foster care, or to prepare them to live independently with the support of aftercare services.


Key Responsibilities:


Care and Support:

  • Ability to treat children/young people and their families with dignity, respect, and unconditional positive regard.
  • Plan, implement, and evaluate care plans, placement plans, and treatment programs.
  • Incorporate understanding of how previous life experiences impact children/young people into practice.
  • Engage in crisis management and physical intervention as per policy (e.g., Therapeutic Crisis Intervention).


Family and Community Engagement:

  • Work collaboratively with parents, families, and other agencies on behalf of the child/young person.
  • Participate in meetings regarding the care and development of children/young people.
  • Provide verbal and written feedback on the progress of children/young people.


Supportive and Advocacy:

  • Promote the rights, responsibilities, and welfare (physical, emotional, social, cultural, ethnic, spiritual) of each child/young person.
  • Encourage and support children/young people in community and family settings.
  • Form relationships and engage with traumatized children/young people.
  • Be a positive role model and advocate for children/young people's well-being.


Organizational and Management:

  • Undertake home management tasks such as budgeting, upkeep, cleaning, and hygiene.
  • Organize personal documents, information, and finances on behalf of children/young people.
  • Arrange age-appropriate activities and ensure the safety and risk assessment of children/young people on-site and during outings.


Educational and Developmental Support:

  • Promote attendance at school, training centers, medical, and clinical appointments.
  • Engage in age-appropriate play and activities with children/young persons.
  • Assist with transfer/referral to other services as needed.


Safety and Crisis Management:

  • Supervise children/young people during outings and maintain safety protocols.
  • Remain calm and manage oneself during volatile or potentially violent situations.
  • Report and respond to incidents promptly, including cases of absconding or abuse prevention.

The above Job Description is not intended to be a comprehensive list of all duties involved and consequently, the post holder may be required to perform other duties as appropriate to the post which may be assigned to him/her from time to time and to contribute to the development of the post while in office.

Must be willing to relocate to Ireland



Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Social Work, Psychology, Sociology, or related field (preferred).
  • More than 5 years of experience working in a residential care setting or with children and young people in a supportive capacity.
  • Knowledge of child development, trauma-informed care, and therapeutic interventions.
  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to build rapport and trust with residents and their families.
  • Ability to work effectively within a multidisciplinary team and collaborate with external agencies.
  • Commitment to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of children and young people.


Alternatively, please contact Rendy Mfene at if you have any questions!

title: Desenvolvedor Java Pleno
description:
Sobre a CTA Smart:

Com atuação internacional, a CTA Smart, líder na gestão de abastecimento e de frota no segmento B2B, possuindo mais de 10 anos de atuação no mercado, vem constantemente se especializando e aprimorando sua tecnologia singular em controle de abastecimento e gestão de frotas.


Somos uma empresa jovem de tecnologia, que proporciona um ambiente gostoso e descontraído para se trabalhar, e estamos em busca de talentos para fazer parte desta empresa que te desafia e dá oportunidades de ser melhor todos os dias, trabalhando com um time que te apoia, te ajuda e te motiva.


Para isso consideramos indispensáveis o bom humor, criatividade e trabalho em equipe.


Responsabilidades e atribuições:

• Desenvolvimento e manutenção em aplicações web-based, sobretudo em backend.

• Definir e realizar testes das funcionalidades que implementa.

• Realizar suas atividades em time, visando resultados da equipe como um todo.

• Discutir alternativas de implementação e arquiteturas com o líder de projeto, apontando opções existentes, com vantagens e desvantagens de cada uma.

• Estimar listas de tarefas e duração de atividades.

• Reportar o andamento de suas atividades com a melhor acuidade possível.

• Participar do processo de revisão de código, inclusive como revisor.

• Participar das sessões de pair programming.

• Manter sempre atenção à qualidade do código produzido, tanto com relação à correção quanto à legibilidade/manutenibilidade.


Requisitos:

• Experiência e sólidos conhecimentos em programação Java, nível pleno ou maior.

• Curso superior completo em Engenharia da Computação, Engenharia de Software, Ciência da Computação ou afins.

• Boa habilidade de comunicação.

• Boa capacidade de resolver problemas e trabalhar em time.

• Fluente em sistema operacional Linux.

• Bom conhecimento sobre banco de dados relacional - SQL.


Desejável:

Inglês Fluente

Conhecimentos básicos em JavaScript, CSS e HTML


Mais informações sobre essa oportunidade:

Tipo de jornada: Integral

Setor: TI

Jornada de Trabalho: segunda a sexta jornada de 8h diárias e 1h de intervalo

Contratação CLT

Salário a combinar (iremos avaliar pretensões salariais)


Benefícios:

VR de 40,00 por dia trabalhado (caju);

Plano de Saúde SulAmérica;

Seguro de vida;

DayOff (uma folga no mês do aniversário);

Modelo remoto.

title: DBA Oracle Pleno
description:
Estamos buscando um Administrador de Banco de Dados (DBA) experiente e detalhista, com expertise em Oracle e SQL Server, para gerenciar, manter e otimizar nossa infraestrutura de banco de dados. O DBA garantirá o desempenho, a segurança e a disponibilidade de bancos de dados de missão crítica, dando suporte a aplicativos de negócios e equipes de desenvolvimento. Esta função requer bons conhecimentos do Oracle Database (19c) e do Microsoft SQL Server (2016/2019/2022), incluindo instalação, configuração, solução de problemas, backup e recuperação, e ajuste de desempenho.


Como será seu dia a dia:

Instalação, configuração e administração de ambientes Oracle Database e SQL Server, incluindo soluções de clustering, alta disponibilidade e replicação.

Implementação de soluções de alta disponibilidade, como Oracle RAC, Oracle Data Guard, SQL Server Always On e Failover Clustering.

Monitoração do desempenho do banco de dados, identificar gargalos e otimizar consultas, índices e planos de execução.

Implementação e manutenção de estratégias de backup, recuperação e recuperação de desastres usando RMAN (Oracle) e soluções de backup nativas do SQL Server.

Garantia de segurança do banco de dados, incluindo controle de acesso, criptografia e conformidade com as regulamentações do setor, como LGPD, GDPR, HIPAA ou SOX.

Execução de patches, atualizações e migrações de banco de dados em diferentes ambientes.

Desenvolvolvimento e manutenção de procedimentos, scripts e ferramentas de automação de banco de dados para tarefas de administração e manutenção.

Colaboração no desenvolvedores de software e equipes de TI para dar suporte ao desenvolvimento de SQL, procedimentos armazenados e ajuste de desempenho.

Planejamento e gerência da capacidade, do dimensionamento e a alocação de recursos do banco de dados.

Fornecimento do suporte técnico e solução de problemas relacionados ao banco de dados.


O que esperamos de você:

Graduação em Ciência da Computação, Tecnologia da Informação, entre outras área de Tecnologia.

Larga experiência como Administrador de Banco de Dados com foco em Oracle e SQL Server.

Proficiência em PL/SQL, T-SQL e técnicas de ajuste de banco de dados.

Experiência com Oracle Grid Infrastructure, ASM, Replicação e Particionamento do SQL Server.

Sólido conhecimento em segurança de banco de dados, auditoria e gerenciamento de acesso.

Familiaridade com soluções de banco de dados em nuvem, como Azure SQL, AWS RDS para SQL Server e Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI).

Experiência em automação de banco de dados utilizando linguagens de script (SQL, PowerShell, Python, Bash).

Sólidas habilidades analíticas e de resolução de problemas, com capacidade de solucionar problemas complexos em bancos de dados.


Diferenciais:

Certificações, tais como:

Oracle Database Administrator Certified Professional (OCP)

Microsoft Certified: Azure Database Administrator Associate

Microsoft Certified: SQL Server Database Administrator


A posição será remota, porém para quem residir na cidade de São Paulo e regiões e estiver há 24 km do escritório da Unisys (Ponte João Dias - Zona Sul), será presencial 3 vezes na semana.


#LI-MV1

title: Recruiter
description:
Alternative Titles: Candidate Sourcer, Talent Acquisition Coordinator, Talent Recruiter, Recruitment Specialist, Candidate Attraction Specialist, Talent Advisor

Company: Little Bridge Search (LBS)

Location: (Remote)


Little Bridge Search (LBS) is an international recruitment agency specializing in connecting exceptional talent with clients across diverse industries, with a strong focus on the Travel, TravelTech, Software, and SaaS sectors. With a proven track record, we connect businesses with exceptional talent, creating meaningful career opportunities.

Job Purpose and Objective:

LBS is expanding its internal recruitment team, and we are seeking candidate recruiters on a full-time or part-time basis.

With increasing demand from both existing and new clients across multiple international markets, we need motivated professionals to help expand our pipeline of qualified candidates. This role offers the flexibility to work on weekdays or weekends, allowing autonomy after completing training.

For those looking to build a long-term career in recruitment, this position provides a strong foundation, with opportunities to progress into full-cycle recruitment, client account management, and leadership roles.


Key Responsibilities :

  • Utilize and other recruitment tools to identify and engage top-tier candidates for roles within the Travel, TravelTech and SaaS industries.
  • Collaborate closely with LBS account managers and clients to understand role requirements, company culture, and long-term talent needs.
  • Proactively build and maintain talent pipelines for immediate and future hiring needs, focusing initially on CSM and BDM positions.
  • Develop and execute targeted sourcing strategies to attract passive candidates for niche roles in product development, management, and technical fields.
  • Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of candidate interactions, job requirements, and hiring progress within the applicant tracking system (ATS) or CRM tools.
  • Stay updated on trends and talent pools within the Travel and TravelTech industries, adapting sourcing strategies to market dynamics.
  • Create compelling outreach messages to engage passive candidates and effectively communicate the value proposition of both LBS and client organisations.
  • Partner with the recruitment team to ensure seamless handoffs of identified candidates for further assessment and interviews.

Additional Responsibilities (Phase Two- Account Management)

  • Conduct screening calls to assess candidates’ skills, experience, and cultural fit for client needs.
  • Build strong relationships with candidates, advocating throughout the recruitment process while ensuring a positive candidate experience.
  • Maintaining and enhancing existing external client relationships.

Skills/Experience and Qualifications :

  • Experience using Recruiter is a plus.
  • Familiarity with Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) or CRM tools, e.g., Lever, Greenhouse, Bullhorn, Salesforce.
  • All levels of recruitment experience will be considered due to multiple vacancies.
  • Professional English proficiency, both written and verbal.
  • Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.

Why Join Little Bridge Search?

  • Comprehensive CV, , and career guidance support.
  • Fully remote global work flexibility.
  • Personalized training and professional development.
  • Corporate retreats, performance-based bonuses, and incentive plans.
  • Retention bonus and equity participation opportunities after 12 months.
  • Unlimited PTO after 1 year of service.

We recognize career paths evolve—whether your future lies with us, our clients, or beyond, we are committed to empowering your professional growth and success.

Application & Screening Process:

  • Apply via : Submit your application through 's Easy Apply feature.
  • Resume Review: Our internal team reviews all resumes initially. Candidates whose professional experience aligns closely with our needs are invited to complete a free DISC personality assessment.
  • All candidates completing the DISC assessment will receive an invitation to our weekly CV Workshop, specifically designed for recruiters and talent acquisition professionals. This highly effective session will empower you to:


  • Maximize CV Visibility: Learn techniques to significantly boost resume performance within Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS), dramatically increasing candidate response rates.
  • Enhance Recruitment Advice: Equip yourself to deliver more informed, effective, and strategic guidance to candidates—critical for excelling in recruitment roles.


Candidates whose DISC results match our role-specific requirements will promptly progress to structured screening interviews, ensuring a mutually beneficial alignment for successful outcomes.

title: Business Development Representative
description:
Our Mission

RoadFlex’s mission is to modernize financial services for the underserved fleet and logistics industry. The logistics industry is the backbone of the US economy. However, the financial infrastructure on which they run is broken. These are underserved industries where the existing financial and payment tools are difficult to use, outdated and saddled with shady fee structures.


We are changing that. RoadFlex believes that the hardworking men and women in this sector deserve better. With RoadFlex, customers can rely on the timely movement of capital for our supply chains to function efficiently. We build financial tools and payment products for drivers and fleet managers. We offer them world-class customer service that work with and around the unique constraints of their daily lives. If you would like to join our mission of helping the people manning the backbone of the US economy, let’s talk!


RoadFlex offers fleet customers an advanced fleet card and expense management solution, powered by AI technology. Our solution provides fleet customers with valuable insights and data- driven decision-making capabilities. With real-time visibility and control, our program enhances fleet operations and performance management, leading to significant cost savings and improved driver retention. Additionally, our solution includes fuel risk management features that effectively prevent fuel fraud and unauthorized purchases. By combining our solution with our exceptional support and customer success programs, we ensure our clients have an excellent fleet expense management experience while achieving a strong return on investment (ROI).


About the role

The ideal candidate for the position of Business Development Representative (BDR) at RoadFlex is a high-performing, team-oriented individual who is eager to advance their sales career. In this role, you will support our sales teams by driving demand for our solution. Your primary responsibilities will include outreach, cold calling potential customers and generating qualified opportunities for our Business Development Representative (BDR) and helping with demos.


You will also be responsible for qualifying inbound leads and scheduling introductory meetings and demos with prospective customers. BDRs play a crucial role in our company's growth, providing valuable experience in interacting with clients from various industries and locations. This position offers a challenging, dynamic, and rewarding work environment with ample opportunities for career growth.


What you’ll do

  • Focus heavily on proactive prospecting (cold calling, industry associations, email campaigns, marketing campaigns, referrals, , etc.) into the assigned territory/region to generate new opportunities for RoadFlex’s Sales Account Executives (AEs)
  • Collaborate closely with your assigned AE to create a targeted list of prospective accounts while working with cross-functional teams to prospect new accounts strategically
  • Research accounts, identify key players, and generate the interest of potential customers, positioning RoadFlex’s unique value proposition
  • Follow up, educate, and qualify inbound leads to create sales-ready meetings and opportunities for our Sales Account Executives
  • Leverage outbound cold-calling and outreach to target accounts across different industries
  • Understand customer needs & effectively communicate how RoadFlex’s unique solution will help drive success for their organization
  • Provide accurate, thorough discovery call handoffs to the appropriate AE and become a trusted and credible source of leads for the sales team
  • Work closely with the Marketing team to drive continuous improvement in lead quality, conversion rates, and pipeline generation through messaging and process improvements
  • Use and maintain RoadFlex’s Sales CRM & other tools to provide metrics on leads, subsequent opportunities, and pipeline development
  • Regularly perform against individual monthly and/or quarterly quota and KPI targets, pipeline development, conversion rates, and qualified opportunities.


Professional Qualifications

  • Minimum of 1-3 years of sales development, business development, or prospecting enterprise organizations, c-suite or executive teams
  • Experience in prospecting and setting meetings in the fleet or telematics industry is a plus
  • Experience with giving demos to prospective clientele
  • Excellent verbal, written and interpersonal communication skills
  • Strong skills in self-sourcing opportunities (outreach) and the ability to appropriately qualify inbound leads
  • Works well with cross-functional teams and performs in a fast-paced, fun, sales-oriented environment
  • Eagerness to achieve goals and quotas
  • Experience working with enterprise sales and CRM tools; , Apollo, and other prospecting tools experience is a plus
  • Must be self-directed, a quick learner, energetic, and an enthusiastic team player with a desire to pursue a career in Sales
  • Challenger-sales methodology skills are a plus
  • This is a remote position


Compensation

We offer a competitive and attractive compensation package that includes base salary + variable compensation based on experience and performance, and a comprehensive employee benefits package. We value teamwork, innovation, and productivity, which will foster an exciting work environment.


Our Background

RoadFlex was founded by serial technology entrepreneurs. Our founders have backgrounds in leading operations at Fortune 500 companies, working on cutting-edge financial products for top financial institutions, and growing technology startups from 5 to 500 employees. With over $20 million in funding, we are backed by some of the industry's most influential technology entrepreneurs and investors. Our partners are just as passionate as we are about modernizing the fleet payments industry.


RoadFlex is backed by the best top-tier VCs and the Founders/CEOs of multi-billion dollar tech companies including Pipe, Flexport, Hippo Insurance, Shippo, Product Hunt, Digits, amongst others.


We have years of runway to grow and support you on your journey. We're looking for customer and product-obsessed entrepreneurs who want to work with a dynamic fast-moving team and build the roadmap for the RoadFlex rocket ship. If this is you, we are super excited to meet you and learn more.


Please note: Send a 2 to 3 minute intro video (share your exp/why you'd be the best/ comp expectation) at

title: Senior Architect
description:
T-Systems, a German multinational company and part of the Deutsche Telekom Group, is seeking a Senior Architect with a good command of English to work 100% remotely.


You will:


  • Build/develop/support scalable cloud architectures for Unreal Pixel Streaming applications;
  • Guide developer to implement cloud architectures;
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, ensure security and compliance standards, optimize performance and cost-efficiency.


Your qualifications:


  • Completed studies in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field;
  • Ability to design scalable, reliable, and cost-effective cloud architectures, including microservices, serverless computing, and containerization (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes);
  • Familiarity with major cloud platforms such as Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud Platform and others;
  • Knowledge of cloud security best practices, identity and access management (IAM), encryption, compliance, and data protection;
  • Strong communication, problem-solving, and project management skills to collaborate with teams and stakeholders effectively;
  • Ability to lead, mentor, and guide development teams, fostering a collaborative and productive environment;
  • Experience in Unreal Engine, Pixel Streaming and WebRTC.


Come be Magenta!

title: Senior Full Stack UI Developer – Angular, TypeScript & API Expert
description:
Job Title: Senior Full Stack UI Developer – Angular, TypeScript & API Expert

Position Type: Full-Time Contract (40hrs/week)

Contract Duration: Long Term

Work Hours: Central Time Zone (CST)

Work Schedule: 8 hours/day (Mon-Fri)

Location: 100% Remote (Candidates can from from anywhere in LATAM Countries)

Overview

We're seeking a Senior Full Stack Developer to join our client's RealTime team. This role is ideal for someone passionate about real-time web applications, data visualization, and working in a distributed team environment. You will contribute to the development of cloud-based, real-time applications that display fracking job data and global site visualizations.

This position emphasizes Angular and TypeScript for the front end, with supporting backend development using .NET 6.0/C# and microservices architecture. Familiarity with real-time processing , Plotly charts , and messaging protocols (MQTT, RabbitMQ, SignalR) is highly desirable.

Key Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, and maintain responsive web applications using Angular and TypeScript
  • Write microservices and APIs using .NET 6.0 and C#
  • Integrate and troubleshoot messaging platforms such as MQTT , RabbitMQ , and Azure Service Bus
  • Work with MongoDB and manage JSON data models
  • Develop and visualize data using Plotly.js charts
  • Use Protobuf and SignalR/WebSockets for real-time communication
  • Write unit tests and participate in Agile/Scrum ceremonies
  • Collaborate across onshore and offshore teams , with daily Scrum meetings at 9 AM CST
  • Use Git and Azure DevOps for version control, CI/CD, and task tracking
  • Assist teammates and participate in code reviews and process improvement

Qualifications

  • 5+ years of experience in full stack development
  • Strong frontend experience with Angular, TypeScript, Plotly (70% frontend)
  • Solid backend skills with .NET 5.0 or 6.0 , C# , microservices, and APIs
  • Hands-on experience with real-time systems , SignalR , MQTT , or RabbitMQ
  • Familiarity with MongoDB or other non-relational databases
  • Strong skills working with JSON , Protobuf , and cloud-based real-time data
  • Experience in Agile/Scrum development environments
  • Strong communication skills; ability to work with distributed teams
  • Able to work independently and take initiative

Nice to Have

  • Experience with real-time geo-location data
  • Background in energy, fracking, or industrial data monitoring
  • Understanding of cloud data ingestion and real-time analytics
  • Experience working across time zones and multicultural teams

title: Senior Full Stack UI Developer – Angular, TypeScript & API Expert
description:
Job Title: Senior Full Stack UI Developer – Angular, TypeScript & API Expert

Position Type: Full-Time Contract (40hrs/week)

Contract Duration: Long Term

Work Hours: Central Time Zone (CST)

Work Schedule: 8 hours/day (Mon-Fri)

Location: 100% Remote (Candidates can from from anywhere in LATAM Countries)

Overview

We're seeking a Senior Full Stack Developer to join our client's RealTime team. This role is ideal for someone passionate about real-time web applications, data visualization, and working in a distributed team environment. You will contribute to the development of cloud-based, real-time applications that display fracking job data and global site visualizations.

This position emphasizes Angular and TypeScript for the front end, with supporting backend development using .NET 6.0/C# and microservices architecture. Familiarity with real-time processing , Plotly charts , and messaging protocols (MQTT, RabbitMQ, SignalR) is highly desirable.

Key Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, and maintain responsive web applications using Angular and TypeScript
  • Write microservices and APIs using .NET 6.0 and C#
  • Integrate and troubleshoot messaging platforms such as MQTT , RabbitMQ , and Azure Service Bus
  • Work with MongoDB and manage JSON data models
  • Develop and visualize data using Plotly.js charts
  • Use Protobuf and SignalR/WebSockets for real-time communication
  • Write unit tests and participate in Agile/Scrum ceremonies
  • Collaborate across onshore and offshore teams , with daily Scrum meetings at 9 AM CST
  • Use Git and Azure DevOps for version control, CI/CD, and task tracking
  • Assist teammates and participate in code reviews and process improvement

Qualifications

  • 5+ years of experience in full stack development
  • Strong frontend experience with Angular, TypeScript, Plotly (70% frontend)
  • Solid backend skills with .NET 5.0 or 6.0 , C# , microservices, and APIs
  • Hands-on experience with real-time systems , SignalR , MQTT , or RabbitMQ
  • Familiarity with MongoDB or other non-relational databases
  • Strong skills working with JSON , Protobuf , and cloud-based real-time data
  • Experience in Agile/Scrum development environments
  • Strong communication skills; ability to work with distributed teams
  • Able to work independently and take initiative

Nice to Have

  • Experience with real-time geo-location data
  • Background in energy, fracking, or industrial data monitoring
  • Understanding of cloud data ingestion and real-time analytics
  • Experience working across time zones and multicultural teams

title: Business Development Representative
description:
A Quadient, através da agência PALM ERA, está procurando de um(a) Representante de Desenvolvimento Comercial (Business Development Representative - BDR) com habilidades de liderança e proatividade para liderar e identificar oportunidades de negócios e novos clientes potenciais no âmbito de Tecnologia B2B, realizar acompanhamento de prospects e oportunidades em andamento em conjunto com a equipe de vendas, e analisar o mercado e a concorrência para identificar tendências e oportunidades. Essa função será contratada pela agência PALM ERA, não pela Quadient.


Responsabilidades:

  • Gerar reuniões qualificadas para a equipe de vendas da América Latina por meio de leads outbound e inbound.
  • Acompanhar e promover todos os programas de marketing: conferências, webinars, campanhas de e-mail e campanhas de marketing online.
  • Realizar pesquisas online para empresas-alvo na região definida.
  • Identificar por telefone os tomadores de decisão nas empresas-alvo.
  • Auxiliar a equipe em eventos de marketing.
  • Gerenciar o SFDC (Salesforce), atividades administrativas e manutenção de banco de dados.
  • Realizar reuniões periódicas de acompanhamento com as equipes de marketing e vendas.
  • Manter-se atualizado sobre as últimas tendências e ferramentas em marketing e vendas.
  • Esta posição é em tempo integral na agência.


Habilidades:

  • Conhecimento indispensável na indústria de tecnologia e negócios B2B.
  • Saber se comunicar de forma clara e persuasiva, tanto verbalmente quanto por escrito, para estabelecer relacionamentos sólidos com clientes e fechar acordos comerciais.
  • Habilidades sólidas de negociação para chegar a acordos benéficos para ambas as partes e fechar negócios com sucesso.
  • Ter um bom entendimento do mercado, assim como da indústria em geral, para identificar oportunidades de negócio e tomar decisões estratégicas.
  • É fundamental ter uma mentalidade orientada a resultados e estar focado em alcançar os objetivos de vendas da empresa.
  • Ser capaz de gerenciar seu tempo de forma eficiente, estabelecendo prioridades e cumprindo prazos.


Experiência necessária:

  • +3 anos de experiência em telemarketing, call center, contact center, vendas, comercial ou áreas similares.
  • Experiência trabalhando com clientes ou contas da indústria de tecnologia.
  • Experiência trabalhando em agências de publicidade.
  • Comunicação efetiva em INGLÊS/ESPANHOL


Esta é uma oportunidade para começar em uma empresa em desenvolvimento, bem posicionada no mercado publicitário internacional. Se você está interessado(a) e atende aos requisitos de experiência, candidate-se ou envie seu CV atualizado para . Obrigado!

title: Professor de inglês
description:
Faça parte da comunidade de professores que está transformando o ensino de idiomas no Brasil!


Onde os influencers do Brasil fazem suas aulas particulares!


A Idioma Independente , referência em inovação no ensino de idiomas, está buscando pessoas proativas, com perfil proativo e fluência em um segundo idioma, que querem ter sucesso no âmbito profissional, para se credenciar como professores e fazer parte da nossa comunidade engajada.


Aqui, você não será apenas mais um perfil online: você será parte de uma rede colaborativa com mais de 400 professores e 4.000 alunos que vivenciam nossa metodologia transformadora hoje, além de mais de 1000 professores e 10.000 alunos que já fizeram parte desta história.


Nos últimos 12 meses tivemos mais de 22 mil alunos interessados em fazer aulas conosco. Professores novos têm lotado suas agendas em até 30 dias, quando são comprometidos, se comunicam de forma eficaz e tem agenda no horário da noite disponível.


*Esta não é uma vaga CLT*


O que oferecemos?


  • Capacitação intensiva para melhoria no ensino de aulas de acordo com a nossa metodologia inovadora
  • Acesso exclusivo a uma plataforma com mais de 400 vídeos de treinamento, baseada em uma metodologia que já entregou resultados incríveis, com vídeos totalmente atualizados .
  • Mentorias semanais com especialistas experientes, que já treinaram mais de 1500 profissionais.
  • Plataforma exclusiva para acompanhamento das aulas.
  • Participação no nosso processo de captação de alunos, com possibilidade de ganhos adicionais relevantes, bastando você se interessar.
  • Descontos exclusivos em cursos de idiomas e viagens com a nossa comunidade.
  • Possibilidade de desenvolvimento e mentoria para ser um empreendedor de sucesso (se você quiser).
  • Um banco de aulas com mais de 800 aulas para facilitar o seu processo de construção de aulas.
  • Certificações dos treinamentos feitos dentro da comunidade que garantem que você obterá mais resultados juntos aos seus alunos e que agregam na sua carreira como professor independente.


Como saber se você é a pessoa certa para fazer parte da maior comunidade de professores independentes do Brasil?


Se você tem grandes ambições para impactar a educação no Brasil, acredita que o ensino de idiomas precisa de inovação, quer otimizar sua agenda de aulas e, ainda, gostaria de crescer como empreendedor, este é o lugar certo para você.


Necessário:


  • Maior de 18 anos , fluente em Português e outro idioma.
  • Disponibilidade de ao menos 20 horas semanais para treinamentos, aulas e ações práticas Esta é uma necessidade para obter os maiores retornos que a comunidade pode te proporcionar.
  • Possibilidade de participar em capacitações durante a semana, no turno da manhã ou tarde.
  • Independência para executar atividades, espírito de colaboração e vontade de contribuir para uma comunidade.


O diferencial?


Aqui você é mais que um professor.


Você será parte de uma comunidade de professores no ensino de idiomas , onde o trabalho colaborativo é a base para alcançar resultados de mercado altamente competitivos.


Esta não é uma vaga CLT , mas sim uma oportunidade de empreender e ser dono do seu crescimento com total suporte e estrutura de uma empresa inovadora.


Você cria laços e relações de confiança com pessoas que realmente se esforçam para te ajudar no seu desenvolvimento, devido ao modelo de negócio inovador que proporciona relações colaborativas e efetivas.


Se você tem vontade de fazer diferente e de vivenciar algo novo na sua história profissional, a ii com certeza é o seu lugar.


Faça parte da mudança no ensino de idiomas. Junte-se à Idioma Independente e transforme sua carreira e a vida de milhares de alunos!


O que eu faço?


  • Recebo capacitação para dar a melhor aula experimental da sua vida
  • Recebo capacitação em nossa metodologia, aprendendo como transformar a vida de muitos alunos, entregando resultado para eles/as
  • Recebo treinamentos e capacitações recorrentes com mentores experientes e especializados
  • Organizo e escolho a minha agenda e os horários que gostaria de ter alunos/as
  • Preparo aulas para os meus alunos/as
  • Dou as aulas para os meus alunos/as


Se você quiser ir além, também será possível, basta você se engajar na comunidade e aprender mais sobre todas as áreas do seu negócio.


QUANTO EU RECEBO POR ISSO?


  • Se você for somente professor, se dedicando 40h na semana a aulas, você poderá receber até R$4.000,00 por mês.
  • Se você quiser aprender sobre diferentes áreas e se engajar na comunidade, você pode construir uma renda mensal de até R$6.000,00 por mês em aproximadamente 1 ano.
  • Se você realmente quiser crescer e se desenvolver, se dedicando de forma integral junto da comunidade é possível chegar até R$12.000,00 por mês em 2 anos.


Tudo isso só dependerá de você, se quiser aprender mais sobre as partes comerciais e sobre como se tornar um mentor/a de professores.


Seja diferente, seja independente

title: Regular Python Developer (CI/CD / Azure)
description:
Project Description:

Provide software engineering in support of development to production of AI business cases. This role involves development and analytics of scalable solutions taking proof of concept to production. This position required someone who is a self-starter, self-sufficient with an open mindset and eager to learn.


Responsibilities:

Backend Development (Python):

Proficient in backend web development using Python, with hands-on experience in FastAPI and database integration.

Containerization & CI/CD:

Skilled in containerization technologies including Docker and Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

Experienced in building and maintaining CI/CD pipelines for streamlined development workflows.

Cloud Computing (Azure):

Practical experience deploying and managing applications using Microsoft Azure for scalable, secure, and efficient cloud solutions.

(Good to Have) Frontend Development:

Proficient in React and TypeScript for developing responsive and dynamic user interfaces.


Mandatory Skills Description:

Backend Development (Python):

Proficient in backend web development using Python, with hands-on experience in FastAPI and database integration.

Containerization & CI/CD:

Skilled in containerization technologies including Docker and Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

Experienced in building and maintaining CI/CD pipelines for streamlined development workflows.

Cloud Computing (Azure):

Practical experience deploying and managing applications using Microsoft Azure for scalable, secure, and efficient cloud solutions.

(Good to Have) Frontend Development:

Proficient in React and TypeScript for developing responsive and dynamic user interfaces.


Nice-to-Have Skills Description:

Frontend Development:

Proficient in React and TypeScript for developing responsive and dynamic user interfaces.


Languages:

English: C2 Proficient

title: Staff Software Engineer
description:
Who We Are:

Shoplift, a New York City-based SaaS startup, empowers thousands of e-commerce merchants like Kith, Skullcandy, Havaianas, and more, to acquire customers more efficiently and profitably by optimizing their online storefronts with our intelligent, automated experimentation and personalization platform.


Your Role:

In this lead role, you'll have jurisdiction over whole features. We're looking for someone who is an engineer in every sense of the word; someone who loves to code, who is deeply knowledgeable about systems architecture, fundamental computing principles, and excels at building products from the ground up.


About the role:

  • As our user base continues to rapidly grow, you'll be part "city planner" and part firefighter, developing a deep understanding of wide swathes of the product's most crucial components and designing new ways to make them scalable and sustainable
  • You'll take things from whiteboard to reality, contemplating and architecting large features with complex requirements
  • You'll pick up your own stories and epics as an IC and add to the team's velocity
  • You will work cross-functionally with product managers, designers, and data scientists to deliver powerful and accessible features


About you

  • You love solving big, hairy problems and obsess over them until you find a solution
  • You have experience with large, real-time data firehoses
  • You love startups and are excited about being part of a fast-growing company
  • You're a top performer and like to work with other top performers
  • You're a quick learner. You can take a look at something you've never seen before and make sense of it quickly.
  • You care about the “why” and want to understand the bigger picture of how the business is helping customers
  • You’re thoughtful and resourceful. For you, problem-solving starts with a clear understanding of the context and an open mind to a wide array of potential solutions.
  • You pride yourself on getting your hands dirty. Whatever it takes to get the job done
  • You have strong attention to detail


Requirements

  • 8+ years of hands-on experience owning entire products or features
  • Extensive experience managing database architecture and db engines
  • Experience with C# or Java
  • Typescript, JS
  • Experience with asynchronous programming patterns
  • Experience with Agile development practices, continuous integration and refactoring
  • Proficiency in using Kubernetes for containerization and orchestration to ensure consistent environments and seamless deployment processes.
  • Understanding of microservices architecture and its deployment patterns in cloud environments.
  • Willing to make key strategic decisions, communicate the reasoning behind those decisions, and follow through on driving adoption


Nice to have

  • Experience with .NET 5+ runtime
  • Experience with Entity Framework Core (with heavy/optimized use of LINQ)
  • Experience training ML models
  • Experience with advanced statistics
  • Experience with the Shopify ecosystem and/or Liquid
  • Education: A bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field

title: Vendedor de varejo
description:
Venha para a Indústria São Miguel!


Somos uma equipe unida pelo mesmo propósito!


“Dar todo o nosso espírito empreendedor para alimentar JUNTOS um futuro próspero.”


Vaga para VENDEDOR DE VAREJO em SALVADOR/BA.


Missão: Prestar atendimento aos Canais de Vendas e Clientes, mediante o fornecimento de informações referentes a preços, lançamento de produtos, promoções e demais condições comerciais para alcance dos objetivos de volume por marca e dos indicadores de gestão.


Que perfil buscamos?

Ensino médio completo.

Possuir Habilitação A ou AB com veículo automotor (moto própria).

Experiência anterior na função.

Conhecimento de vendas e atendimento a clientes.

Manejo de ferramentas digitais.


Quais serão seus desafios?

Realizar visitas aos clientes conforme programação diária, mantendo relacionamento na venda e no pós-venda, realizando registros de todas as interações, objetivando o atingimento das metas de vendas.

Verificar informações para cumprimento da rotina diária, assim como tabela de preços, visando assegurar a realização do planejamento da área.

Utilizar materiais de Merchandising nas visitas aos clientes.

Executar visita aos PDVs, analisando perfil para propor ação e MIX ideal, reposição mensal, substituição de cartazes, faixas e bandôs dos produtos da ISM que estiverem danificados ou em locais inadequados.

Cumprir os passos da venda de forma a garantir a qualidade na execução do serviço, conforme procedimento da ISM.


O que nós oferecemos para você?

  • Fazer parte de uma empresa líder, em fase de crescimento exponencial
  • Horário de funcionamento: segunda a sexta, das 7:30h às 17:18h. Pelo menos um sábado por mês.
  • Localização: Rodovia BR 324, KM 619 – Loteamento Industrial, Salvador/BA.
  • Variável
  • Manutenção moto
  • Combustível
  • Vale Alimentação
  • Vale Refeição
  • Plano de saúde e odontológico
  • Desconto em Faculdades para cursos de graduação e pós graduação
  • TotalPass
  • Cesta de natal

title: Private Banker - Consultor de investimentos (CVM, CEA, CFP)
description:
VAGA PARA NÍVEL BRASIL


Se você já é do mercado financeiro, e pensa em atuar em um modelo 100% alinhado com os interesses do cliente, podendo utilizar diversas plataformas (como BTG, XP, Ágora, Safra, C6..), recebendo um repasse atrativo, venha conversar conosco e conhecer o projeto da API CAPITAL Investimentos.


Em pouco mais de 2 anos de estrada superamos a marca de 400 clientes e ~R$600 milhões sob consultoria, contamos com uma estrutura de apoio ao banker com o uso de sistemas de terceiros (consolidador, CRM) e sistemas proprietários.


Responsabilidades

  • Prospeção de clientes;
  • Elaboração de planos de investimento personalizados para seus clientes, com recomendações sem conflito de interesse;
  • Acompanhar e avaliar o desempenho dos investimentos dos clientes e fazer ajustes quando necessário;
  • Estudar, estudar e estudar. Para poder entregar um trabalho diferenciado para seu cliente.



Buscamos profissionais que já possuem acima de R$ 20 milhões de carteira e que aceitem modelo de remuneracão 100% variável.

title: Power Platform Developer
description:
Estamos à procura de fortalecer a nossa equipa de Power Platform com um entusiasta de low-code.


Os teus principais desafios

  • Desenvolver Apps Canvas e Model-Driven
  • Desenvolver fluxos Power Automate
  • Desenvolver soluções Dataverse


Competências técnicas que procuramos

  • Compreensão do stack Power Platform
  • Conhecimento de PowerFx
  • Conhecimento de DAX, SQL, Javascript/TypeScript será considerado uma mais-valia


Competências interpessoais que valorizamos

  • Empreendedor, orientado para soluções e sem medo de expressar uma opinião
  • Comunicador claro e desinibido
  • Capaz de gerir o tempo e a autonomia
  • Resiliência
  • Fome de aprender e ser desafiado


A Empresa

Estamos no mercado desde 2011 e ajudamos os nossos clientes nas suas jornadas de transformação digital. A maior parte do nosso trabalho é em inteligência empresarial, automação, desenvolvimento de apps e consultoria ERP. Queremos crescer equipas de fusão que promovam a diversidade e a inovação no desenvolvimento de novos produtos. Estamos a procurar entrar em mercados internacionais com uma oferta de produtos e serviços integrados com soluções e stacks tecnológicos líderes.


Cultura e Experiência do Colaborador

O cliente é o foco. As pessoas são responsáveis por gerir o seu tempo e a avaliação é orientada para os resultados. Queremos feedback contínuo dos colaboradores e transparência. Aprender é a única forma de melhorar todos os dias e estamos motivados para melhorar continuamente. As opiniões são bem-vindas e importam.


O que oferecemos

  • Contrato feito por PJ
  • Full remote
  • Valor competitivo
  • Prémios atrativos, baseados no cumprimento de metas
  • Oportunidade de crescimento e desenvolvimento numa empresa inovadora
  • Participação em projetos inovadores e tecnologicamente desafiantes, tanto nacionais como internacionais

title: Senior Full Stack Engineer (LatAm)
description:
The Opportunity

We are looking for a Senior / Staff Engineer BASED IN LATAM with full-stack experience, particularly in back-end, distributed, API-based, and platform systems. Ideally, you have a solid understanding of front-end technologies, including React, and have worked in the credit reporting, financial, and/or accounting sectors. You will play a pivotal role in the future growth of our company during a critical time of transformation. You will be responsible for the credit reporting and internal services technical systems and direction . You will closely work with various product owners and credit reporting specialists to create and own the product and business initiatives and roadmap pertaining to our credit reporting and internal services strategy. This role requires a high degree of collaboration with senior leadership, key managers, and product owners across the organization (e.g, Product, Credit Reporting Specialists, Operations, Risk Management). Your product and technical guidance along with working through and empowering others will enable new products and improve current ones in order to reach more customers and provide delightful and enriching customer experiences.


You will be working on our next generation back-end services and credit reporting engine that will enable the company to benefit millions of people . This work will allow you to own and lead the development of key features across multiple lines of business. In addition to the technical responsibilities, you will coach, mentor, and develop our engineers by providing professional training and direct mentorship. You will help recruit, hire, and onboard new talent into the team. You will ensure efficient delivery through effective planning, setting expectations, prioritizing, and delegating. You will exhibit and foster the company's culture and operating principles.


Core Competencies

  • Thoughtful and Adaptable Leadership: As part of the engineering leadership team, you will help set the direction for all data centric initiatives. You are deliberate in your ability to clearly define the vision and approach. You are able to focus on achieving the big picture while being able to drill down into details to enable, empower, guide, and unblock your teams and individuals.
  • Product and Business Acumen: You demonstrate ownership and an entrepreneurial mindset. You believe that technology is a tool to be leveraged to delight customers and deliver business value. You are able to articulate the definition of a Minimally Viable Product (MVP) without sacrificing quality. You believe that perfection should not hinder progress. You have experience being a Product Owner and/or Business Owner, producing roadmaps and product/business plans.
  • Technology: Although there is no expectation for you to be working directly with code on a daily basis, it is expected that you are able to write, review, debug, and test code and systems. You get involved in troubleshooting, building proof of concepts, and architecting systems and features. Your experience as a technologist enables you to optimally function in engineering and data design discussions. You champion automation and look for opportunities to automate and codify manual processes.
  • Compliance and Security: Security considerations are always top of mind for you. You demonstrate good stewardship of data which is demonstrated in your planning and design approach. You apply compliance and governance considerations to every decision you and your team make; making sure to comply with legal and regulatory requirements. You help the company achieve compliance and security attestations.
  • Empathetic Leader: Your leadership style sets the tone for communication and collaboration within your teams. You invest time in regular 1:1s with your directs and peers. You provide direction and autonomy to your teams and empower them to deliver within time and budget. You coach and provide regular feedback/advice to growth and develop the individuals in your teams. You leverage radical candor, directness, and kindness when communicating with others.
  • Balance Velocity with Long Term Goals: You balance thinking big with delivering the right thing in an agile and speedy manner. Your and your team’s work is of the highest quality and you continue to raise the bar within your immediate team and our organization. When appropriate, you take shortcuts due to customer or business needs; documenting them and outlining fast-follows to remediate any shortcomings. You divide your and your team’s work in phases each delivering value and moving us towards accomplishing the desired outcome and goals.


Basic Qualifications

  • Very Strong experience in back-end, microservice, API-driven, and data pipelines engineering work experience.
  • Strong experience in the credit reporting, accounting, lending, banking, payments, screening companies, insurance, subscriptions, or similar industry.
  • Strong experience mentoring individual contributors, including back-end engineers.
  • Experience leading both product and business strategy, and planning and roadmap delivery.
  • Experience with general-purpose languages like Go, Python, C++, Java.
  • Experience with AWS services such as S3, SNS/SQS, Lambda, ECS/EKS.
  • Experience on database solutions, including Relational and NoSQL data stores.
  • Experience with microservices and event-driven architectures.
  • Experience working in and fostering environments that utilize Infrastructure-as-Code and DevOps.
  • Experience managing globally distributed teams.
  • Passionate about delivery in an agile environment.


Above and Beyond

  • Experience in the FinTech or PropTech areas.
  • Experience in a startup environment.
  • Experience in SOC2 or similar certified organizations.
  • Experience with front-end languages like JavaScript, TypeScript, Dart, and Frameworks such as React, Flutter.


Key Technologies We Use

  • Cloud: Amazon Web Services (AWS)
  • Backend: Go
  • Frontend: Typescript, Javascript, React
  • Mobile: Flutter
  • Data: MongoDB, PostgreSQL


Benefits

  • Competitive Salary for Series B startup
  • Remote Work Friendly - While you may be asked to meet in person from time to time, your work setting will be primarily remote and you will be expected to be available during ET business hours (9a-5p). We trust you to manage your work and deliverables as you need to. As long as quality work is being done, you can choose the environment that works for you.
  • Mission driven company with strong culture

You divide your and your team’s work in phases each delivering value and moving us towards accomplishing the desired outcome and goals.


Basic Qualifications

  • Very Strong experience in back-end, microservice, API-driven, and data pipelines engineering work experience.
  • Strong experience in the credit reporting, accounting, lending, banking, payments, screening companies, insurance, subscriptions, or similar industry.
  • Strong experience mentoring individual contributors, including back-end engineers.
  • Experience leading both product and business strategy, and planning and roadmap delivery.
  • Experience with general-purpose languages like Go, Python, C++, Java.
  • Experience with AWS services such as S3, SNS/SQS, Lambda, ECS/EKS.
  • Experience on database solutions, including Relational and NoSQL data stores.
  • Experience with microservices and event-driven architectures.
  • Experience working in and fostering environments that utilize Infrastructure-as-Code and DevOps.
  • Experience managing globally distributed teams.
  • Passionate about delivery in an agile environment.


Above and Beyond

  • Experience in the FinTech or PropTech areas.
  • Experience in a startup environment.
  • Experience in SOC2 or similar certified organizations.
  • Experience with front-end languages like JavaScript, TypeScript, Dart, and Frameworks such as React, Flutter.


Key Technologies We Use

  • Cloud: Amazon Web Services (AWS)
  • Backend: Go
  • Frontend: Typescript, Javascript, React
  • Mobile: Flutter
  • Data: MongoDB, PostgreSQL


Benefits

  • Competitive Salary for Series B startup
  • Remote Work Friendly - While you may be asked to meet in person from time to time, your work setting will be primarily remote and you will be expected to be available during ET business hours (9a-5p). We trust you to manage your work and deliverables as you need to. As long as quality work is being done, you can choose the environment that works for you.
  • Mission driven company with strong culture

title: SAP Data Migration Consultant
description:
We are currently looking for an SAP Data Migration Consultant for a full-time permanent role with a global end client of ours.


The role offers the opportunity to work in diverse global teams and be part of an industry leading company. Our client is also offering a competitive salary and attractive benefit package!


Although this is a 100% remote working role, our client is currently focusing on candidates based in Brazil .

Your qualifications and skills:

  • Must have S/4HANA Data Migration and Fiori app, LTMC, LTMOM experience.
  • Experience in SAP Data Migration with DS and ETL is required.
  • Experience in end-to-end Data Migration Projects and SAP deployments.
  • Experience in S/4HANA Data Migration projects with strong ABAP knowledge.
  • Knowledge on working with SAP and non-SAP system as source and target.
  • Extensive knowledge of developing real time interfaces like IDOC, BAPI, LTMC Staging Tables, S/4HANA Data Migration cockpit, Fiori App Migrate your data, ETL with Data Services.
  • Strong communication skills.


If you could be interested, please apply and share your updated CV!

title: Data Entry Specialist
description:
Case Investigator – Brazil (Data Entry Specialist with an OSINT background)


Compensation

  • Budget: $500-$800 per month which will depend on skillset.
  • Contract Type: Independent Contractor (2 years - renewable)
  • Fully Remote


About the Role

Ruvixx is a fast-growing SaaS company providing data-driven solutions for marketing, sales, and compliance. We work with global leaders like Adobe, Trimble, and Siemens to protect intellectual property and combat piracy.



We’re seeking a Case Investigator in Brazil to bridge the gap between data entry and investigative research. This role involves gathering, analyzing, and validating data to support compliance and anti-piracy efforts. You will work closely with engagement teams, building high-quality case reports that drive real business impact.



Responsibilities


✅ Research & Investigate – Conduct open-source intelligence (OSINT) investigations to identify and verify targets.

✅ Data Enrichment & Validation – Review, clean, and enhance datasets using internal tools, databases, and external sources .

✅ Case Documentation & Reporting – Compile detailed reports with verified information, ensuring high accuracy.

✅ Support Compliance Efforts – Provide actionable data to engagement teams for outreach and negotiations.

✅ Process Optimization – Identify data inconsistencies, suggest improvements, and refine research methodologies .


Requirements


✔ English Proficiency – Must be able to read, write, and communicate effectively in English.

✔ 1+ Year Experience – Preferably in data entry, OSINT research, or compliance investigations .

✔ Tech-Savvy – Familiarity with databases, CRM systems (Salesforce preferred), and research tools .

✔ Strong Analytical & Investigative Skills – Ability to interpret and cross-reference multiple data points .

✔ Attention to Detail – Precision and accuracy in case documentation and data management.

To confirm you've read this job post carefully, please send a couple of sentences about your favourite color in any random language that isn't Spanish, English or Portuguese to Candidates who do not do this will not be considered.

✔ Excel & OSINT Knowledge – Proficiency in Excel (Google Sheets) and familiarity with open-source investigation tools .


Preferred Skills & Experience


Experience in compliance, sales intelligence, or anti-piracy investigations .

Comfortable handling large datasets and conducting online research .

title: Lead eCommerce Engineer
description:
In this role you will:


• Work in a team and collaborate with coworkers;

• Communicate with members of the development team, clients and stakeholders;

• Solve problems in a creative and efficient way;

• Seek solutions and improvements;

• Work independently and self-manage;

• Quickly adapt to changes;

• Plan and organize testing tasks efficiently;

• Understand the product's purpose.


Required Qualifications:


• Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Business Administration or related field;

• Strong knowledge with Next.js & React (modern front-end development);

• Experience with Node.js (back-end development and API integration);

• Experience with Apigee (API management and gateway);

• Experience with AWS (hosting & cloud services), with a potential migration to Microsoft Azure;

• Knowledge with ContentStack (Headless CMS);

• CI/CD Pipelines (GitHub Actions, Jenkins or similar);

• Microservices Architecture and API design best practices;

• Experience with SQL and NoSQL Databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, DynamoDB, MongoDB);

• Authentication & Authorization (OAuth, JWT, SSO);

• Performance Optimization & Security Best Practice;

• Fluent in English (both written and spoken); additional languages are a plus;


Preferred Skills:


• Experience with Agile Methodologies;

• JIRA / Confluence;

• Proven experience working in Agile environments;

• Strong problem-solving and analytical abilities;

• Ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.


Language:


Advance English

title: Desenvolvedor Frontend Pleno
description:
A Época Cosméticos é uma loja online do grupo Magazine Luiza, presente no mercado desde 2006. Com um portfólio completo, oferecemos uma vasta seleção de perfumes, dermocosméticos e produtos de beleza das melhores marcas do mundo. No entanto, nossa missão vai além de simplesmente vender produtos. Acreditamos que a beleza é uma fonte de empoderamento e transformação, e estamos aqui para proporcionar ferramentas que permitam a você se sentir feliz e confiante todos os dias, celebrando a beleza que você escolhe para si mesma.


Responsabilidades


  • Criar websites, landing pages, hotsites ou aplicações web otimizadas para ecommerce;
  • Realizar a manutenção e melhoria constante dessas plataformas;
  • Otimizar aplicações para garantir usabilidade e performance;
  • Garantir que plataformas funcionem bem em diferentes navegadores e dispositivos;
  • Trabalhar juntamente com desenvolvedores Back-end e UX Designers para garantir a melhor experiência;
  • Garantir alta qualidade de plataformas e consistência com a marca;
  • Se manter atualizado às últimas tendências digitais da área.


Requisitos Obrigatórios


  • Domínio de HTML, CSS, JavaScript e jQuery;
  • Experiência em criação de websites amigáveis para usuários;
  • Experiência de no mínimo 3 anos comprovada como Desenvolvedor(a) Front-end;
  • Compreensão do processo completo de criação de websites (desde o design, desenvolvimento até a entrega);
  • Familiaridade com desenvolvimento cross-browser e responsivo;
  • Conhecimento da Plataforma VTEX;
  • VTEX Faststore
  • Next.js
  • Core Web Vitals
  • Aplicações web com renderização server side
  • Monitoramento de aplicações Web
  • Experiência com ecommerce

title: Business Development Representative
description:
A Quadient, através da agência PALM ERA, está procurando de um(a) Representante de Desenvolvimento Comercial (Business Development Representative - BDR) com habilidades de liderança e proatividade para liderar e identificar oportunidades de negócios e novos clientes potenciais no âmbito de Tecnologia B2B, realizar acompanhamento de prospects e oportunidades em andamento em conjunto com a equipe de vendas, e analisar o mercado e a concorrência para identificar tendências e oportunidades. Essa função será contratada pela agência PALM ERA, não pela Quadient.


Responsabilidades:

  • Gerar reuniões qualificadas para a equipe de vendas da América Latina por meio de leads outbound e inbound.
  • Acompanhar e promover todos os programas de marketing: conferências, webinars, campanhas de e-mail e campanhas de marketing online.
  • Realizar pesquisas online para empresas-alvo na região definida.
  • Identificar por telefone os tomadores de decisão nas empresas-alvo.
  • Auxiliar a equipe em eventos de marketing.
  • Gerenciar o SFDC (Salesforce), atividades administrativas e manutenção de banco de dados.
  • Realizar reuniões periódicas de acompanhamento com as equipes de marketing e vendas.
  • Manter-se atualizado sobre as últimas tendências e ferramentas em marketing e vendas.
  • Esta posição é em tempo integral na agência.


Habilidades:

  • Conhecimento indispensável na indústria de tecnologia e negócios B2B.
  • Saber se comunicar de forma clara e persuasiva, tanto verbalmente quanto por escrito, para estabelecer relacionamentos sólidos com clientes e fechar acordos comerciais.
  • Habilidades sólidas de negociação para chegar a acordos benéficos para ambas as partes e fechar negócios com sucesso.
  • Ter um bom entendimento do mercado, assim como da indústria em geral, para identificar oportunidades de negócio e tomar decisões estratégicas.
  • É fundamental ter uma mentalidade orientada a resultados e estar focado em alcançar os objetivos de vendas da empresa.
  • Ser capaz de gerenciar seu tempo de forma eficiente, estabelecendo prioridades e cumprindo prazos.


Experiência necessária:

  • +3 anos de experiência em telemarketing, call center, contact center, vendas, comercial ou áreas similares.
  • Experiência trabalhando com clientes ou contas da indústria de tecnologia.
  • Experiência trabalhando em agências de publicidade.
  • Comunicação efetiva em INGLÊS/ESPANHOL


Esta é uma oportunidade para começar em uma empresa em desenvolvimento, bem posicionada no mercado publicitário internacional. Se você está interessado(a) e atende aos requisitos de experiência, candidate-se ou envie seu CV atualizado para . Obrigado!
company: Quadient, através da agência PALM ERA

title: Especialista de WFM Bilíngue
description:
CONCENTRIX


Somos fanáticos por nossas pessoas! E demonstramos isso oferecendo uma cultura de pertencimento; caminhos claros para o desenvolvimento de carreira; programas de apoio profissional, coaching e mentoria, uma rede global de amigos e colegas que podem te suportar e mais! (Tipo, muito mais.).


Quer estar em uma multinacional que é Great Place to Work, apoiar as melhores marcas do mercado, inovar e mudar o mundo – tudo ao mesmo tempo em que estabelece conexões reais com as pessoas e desenvolve sua carreira?


Seja um #gamechanger Junte-se ao nosso time e vamos tornar isso oficial!


Todas as vagas da Concentrix vagas são elegíveis a Pessoas com Deficiência.



Estamos procurando por um (a) Especialista de WFM Bilíngue


O que você fará:


  • Apoiar a equipe de WFM na utilização do ECP;
  • Liderar as reuniões semanais da equipe de suporte do ECP;
  • Implementação e transição de novos projetos


Se você:


  • Possui experiência em BPO’s;
  • Possui inglês nível C2;
  • Tem habilidades avançadas em Microsoft Office (Excel e PowerPoint são essenciais);
  • Tem ensino superior completo;
  • Possui equilíbrio emocional e foco em melhoria contínua;
  • É habilidoso no gerenciamento de conflitos


Aqui é o seu lugar!


O que oferecemos:


Remuneração: R$9.000,00 a R$10.000,00 + VR + plano de saúde e odontológico

Horário: seg a sex - 09:00 - 19:00 /Int 01:00

Jornada: 100% home office

  • Possui experiência em BPO’s;
  • Possui inglês nível C2;
  • Tem habilidades avançadas em Microsoft Office (Excel e PowerPoint são essenciais);
  • Tem ensino superior completo;
  • Possui equilíbrio emocional e foco em melhoria contínua;
  • É habilidoso no gerenciamento de conflitos


Aqui é o seu lugar!


O que oferecemos:


Remuneração: R$9.000,00 a R$10.000,00 + VR + plano de saúde e odontológico

Horário: seg a sex - 09:00 - 19:00 /Int 01:00

Jornada: 100% home office

title: Especialista Java
description:
We Are Sportingtech:

Sportingtech is a multi-award-winning provider of turnkey betting and gaming solutions designed for regulated and emerging markets around the world. With offices in Malta, Bulgaria, London, Brazil and Portugal, our iGaming platform offers everything covering sportsbook, casino and retail via a modular system and intuitive back office for a fully omni-channel solution. Our unparalleled ability to cater for local-market customisation and operator preferences provides players

with an optimal betting experience, resulting in proven growth for our rapidly expanding customer base.


Where you Fit In:

As a Senior Java Developer, you will be responsible for the development and maintenance of our Java-based gaming platform. You will collaborate closely with product managers, designers, architects and other stakeholders to ensure the delivery of high-quality, scalable, and secure solutions. Your role will be hands-on and will contribute to the overall quality of our products.


The impact you will have:

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, test, and deploy robust Java applications.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code while following best practices and coding standards.
  • Analyze and troubleshoot complex technical issues, providing innovative solutions and improvements.
  • Create and maintain comprehensive technical documentation to aid in code understanding and future enhancements.
  • Work closely with team members, including architects, developers, and QA’s, to deliver high-quality software in a timely fashion.
  • Identify and implement performance enhancements, scalability improvements, and code optimizations.
  • Stay up to date with the latest Java-related technologies and frameworks to recommend and implement the best solutions.
  • Participate in and conduct code reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to standards.
  • Implement security best practices and contribute to maintaining the security of applications.
  • Embrace agile development methodologies, such as Scrum or Kanban, to facilitate project delivery.


What we’re looking for:

  • Practical experience and a strong grasp of Java concurrency
  • Development of distributed systems
  • Proficiency and skills in at least one of the following technologies: AMQP, ZeroMQ, JMS, Kafka, Hazelcast
  • Knowledge of Spring, JDBC, and relational databases
  • Proficient in SQL
  • Familiarity with ETL processes
  • Background in backend development, including Rest API practice
  • Proficiency in creating automated unit and integration tests
  • Experience with ORM, XML, JSON, and HTML
  • Experience with dependency injection, data binding
  • Understanding of principles of the Clean Architecture
  • Knowledge of Multi-thread applications, OOP & MVC concepts and design patterns
  • Understanding principles of database modelling and programming like PL/SQL, pgSQL
  • Basic Knowledge of Maven, Docker, Gradle.


What we offer you:

  • Full-time employment under Brazilian CLT contract with competitive salary
  • Flexible work environment with plenty of learning and growth opportunities
  • Porto Seguro OuroMax Health Plan
  • Flash Card for meals and groceries – R$ 1200/month
  • Porto Seguro Bronze 10 Dental Plan
  • MetLife Life Insurance
  • Birthday day-off
  • Access to O’Reilly Online Learning Platform


Sportingtech is an equal opportunity employer. We value diversity and are committed to providing a work environment of mutual respect to everyone without regard to race, colour, religion, national origin, age, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances.

title: Back End Developer
description: Our client is looking for a back-end developer to bring onboard and join a renowned team that is transforming the future of renting. You will Support building out the backend for a portal for merchants to set up rewards for the client's customers to drive engagement and spending at their local businesses.

title: Staff Software Engineer
description:
Who We Are:

Shoplift, a New York City-based SaaS startup, empowers thousands of e-commerce merchants like Kith, Skullcandy, Havaianas, and more, to acquire customers more efficiently and profitably by optimizing their online storefronts with our intelligent, automated experimentation and personalization platform.


Your Role:

In this lead role, you'll have jurisdiction over whole features. We're looking for someone who is an engineer in every sense of the word; someone who loves to code, who is deeply knowledgeable about systems architecture, fundamental computing principles, and excels at building products from the ground up.


About the role:

  • As our user base continues to rapidly grow, you'll be part "city planner" and part firefighter, developing a deep understanding of wide swathes of the product's most crucial components and designing new ways to make them scalable and sustainable
  • You'll take things from whiteboard to reality, contemplating and architecting large features with complex requirements
  • You'll pick up your own stories and epics as an IC and add to the team's velocity
  • You will work cross-functionally with product managers, designers, and data scientists to deliver powerful and accessible features


About you

  • You love solving big, hairy problems and obsess over them until you find a solution
  • You have experience with large, real-time data firehoses
  • You love startups and are excited about being part of a fast-growing company
  • You're a top performer and like to work with other top performers
  • You're a quick learner. You can take a look at something you've never seen before and make sense of it quickly.
  • You care about the “why” and want to understand the bigger picture of how the business is helping customers
  • You’re thoughtful and resourceful. For you, problem-solving starts with a clear understanding of the context and an open mind to a wide array of potential solutions.
  • You pride yourself on getting your hands dirty. Whatever it takes to get the job done
  • You have strong attention to detail


Requirements

  • 8+ years of hands-on experience owning entire products or features
  • Extensive experience managing database architecture and db engines
  • Experience with C# or Java
  • Typescript, JS
  • Experience with asynchronous programming patterns
  • Experience with Agile development practices, continuous integration and refactoring
  • Proficiency in using Kubernetes for containerization and orchestration to ensure consistent environments and seamless deployment processes.
  • Understanding of microservices architecture and its deployment patterns in cloud environments.
  • Willing to make key strategic decisions, communicate the reasoning behind those decisions, and follow through on driving adoption


Nice to have

  • Experience with .NET 5+ runtime
  • Experience with Entity Framework Core (with heavy/optimized use of LINQ)
  • Experience training ML models
  • Experience with advanced statistics
  • Experience with the Shopify ecosystem and/or Liquid
  • Education: A bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field

title: Desenvolvedor Sênior
description:
Na Stefanini, acreditamos no poder da colaboração. Co-criamos soluções inovadoras em parceria com nossos clientes, combinando tecnologia de ponta, inteligência artificial e a criatividade humana. Estamos na vanguarda da resolução de problemas de negócios, proporcionando impacto real em escala global.


Ao se juntar à Stefanini, você se torna parte de uma jornada global de transformação. Estamos empenhados em criar impacto positivo não apenas nos negócios, mas também na vida de nossos colaboradores. Se você procura uma oportunidade de crescimento profissional em uma empresa que valoriza inovação, respeito, autonomia e parceria, você encontra aqui!


Junte-se a nós e seja parte da mudança!


Estamos em busca de um Desenvolvedor Sênior para se juntar ao nosso time. O candidato ideal deve ter experiência sólida em desenvolvimento, com sólidos conhecimentos em Java 8+ e API de streaming. É essencial ter experiência com o Eco Sistema Spring (Spring boot, Spring batch, Spring JPA), Mensageria (IBMmq, kafka), Banco de Dados Oracle (com foco em planos de execução para melhorar a performance), Mapas (listas com chave e valor), Padrões de projeto, Versionamento com GIT, Containers/Openshift/Docker, Maven e Testes Unitários.


Como diferencial, valorizamos o conhecimento em mercado de meios de pagamentos e iso8583 .


Benefícios:


Vale Alimentação ou Vale Refeição;

‍ Desconto em cursos, universidades e instituições de idiomas;

Academia Stefanini - plataforma com cursos online, gratuitos, atualizados e com certificado;

Mentoring;

Clube de vantagens para consultas e exames;

Assistência Médica;
