title: Tech Lead
description:
Sobre a Hiflex


A Hiflex Group surgiu em 2013 da experiência profissional dos seus executivos na área de Gestão de Projetos e Change Management.

Nossa especialidade é o apoio para empresas que buscam por transformações organizacionais e Business Agility, através dos serviços prestados pela nossa equipe de Hiflexers: treinamentos, mentorias, certificação, diagnósticos e Agile Coaching Nossa equipe multidisciplinar de Hiflexers possui grande expertise em: métodos ágeis, métodos híbridos, PMO, Gestão de Projetos, Gestão de Produtos, OKRs, Lean, Business Agility e Change Management.

Nossa missão é ajudar pessoas e organizações a atingir melhores resultados através de abordagens enxutas, ágeis e colaborativas de gestão.


Sobre a vaga


Cargo: Tech Lead

Tempo de contrato: 3 a 6 meses (com possibilidade de renovação)

Modalidade de contratação: PJ ou Cooperado

Modalidade de trabalho : 100% remoto.


O que você precisa ter:

Bacharelado em ciência da computação ou áreas afins.

Experiência no desenvolvimento de microsserviços de classe mundial usando o Apache Spring Boot.

Experiência em habilidades de desenvolvimento Java na construção de aplicativos da Web e APIs em larga escala usando princípios orientados a objetos.

Experiência com Spring Framework, ORM (Hibernate, JPA).

Experiência com Oracle SQL e MS SQL.

Familiaridade com o design de sistema: Uma sólida compreensão do design do sistema é essencial.

Bons conhecimentos de ferramentas de colaboração: GitLab, GIT, Sonarqube, etc.

Forte senso de dedicação e trabalho em equipe em direção a uma experiência de desenvolvimento Full-Stack.

Experiência na indústria de serviços financeiros.

Experiência com tecnologias de nuvem como AWS S3, RDS, ELB, etc.


Diferencial

Ter experiência com ramo de tecnologia da informação / serviços financeiros (meios de pagamento).

Ingles técnico para conversação e leitura de documentos.

Inciativas ágeis ou background já com squads ágeis para trabalhar na mudança do modus operandi atual (pressão / prazo).

Trabalhado em projetos de migração de sistema on-premise para ambiente cloud.

Diferencial: experiência com meios de pagamento e softwares embarcados.


Atividades a serem desenvolvidas

Projetar e desenvolver grandes aprimoramentos funcionais ou de desempenho para produtos existentes e novos produtos ou ferramentas de software.

Tornar-se um especialista no assunto para nossos Sistemas de POS, com a capacidade de explicar e melhorar bases de código complicadas e auxiliar na solução de problemas complexos

Assuma um papel de liderança na direção da arquitetura para dimensionar a tecnologia e o processo em alta escala e qualidade.

Trabalhe em estreita colaboração com as partes interessadas em vários grupos internos para ajudar a equilibrar a velocidade e a qualidade da entrega.

Orientar e treinar desenvolvedores juniores para maximizar a velocidade da equipe.

Condução do ciclo completo de desenvolvimento de ponta a ponta, desde o design até a implementação.

Projetar, prototipar e criar código para componentes e aplicativos de software.

title: Recruitment Consultant
description:
Company Overview: AMX Healthcare is a leading national workforce solutions provider committed to connecting talented healthcare professionals with exceptional career opportunities. We're driven by innovation, technology, and a supportive, dynamic culture that fosters personal and professional growth.


Role Summary: The Recruiter will be responsible for conducting high-volume candidate outreach via telephone, screening healthcare professionals for both temporary and permanent assignments, effectively selling job opportunities, retrieving essential compliance documentation, and accurately updating our Applicant Tracking System (ATS). The ideal candidate will thrive in a fast-paced environment, be comfortable with high call volumes, and excel at building lasting relationships with healthcare professionals.


High-Volume Candidate Outreach:

  • Conduct 100+ outbound calls per day to prospective healthcare candidates.
  • Screen and qualify candidates effectively, matching their skills and interests to available job opportunities.
  • Clearly communicate job descriptions, assignment details, and benefits to candidates to generate interest.


Relationship Building & Candidate Management:

  • Establish strong relationships with candidates through consistent and professional communication.
  • Proactively follow up with candidates throughout the recruitment process to maintain engagement and commitment.
  • Actively manage and nurture candidate pipelines for future opportunities.


Compliance & Documentation:

  • Obtain and verify job-specific compliance documents, including licenses, credentials, and background check information.
  • Ensure candidates meet all compliance requirements prior to placement.
  • Maintain up-to-date and accurate compliance documentation within the ATS.


Applicant Tracking System (ATS) Management:

  • Accurately enter and update candidate details, communications, and compliance information within the ATS.
  • Regularly audit ATS records to ensure completeness and accuracy.


Performance & Target Achievement:

  • Consistently meet or exceed daily and weekly activity targets for calls, screenings, candidate submissions, and compliance completion.
  • Monitor recruitment metrics and suggest process improvements to enhance productivity and effectiveness.


Qualifications:

  • Proven experience in recruitment, high-volume candidate sourcing, telemarketing, or related roles.
  • Excellent telephone communication skills and confidence handling high call volumes daily.
  • Strong organizational skills with the ability to multitask and prioritize effectively.
  • Familiarity with ATS platforms and compliance processes in healthcare recruitment.


Skills & Attributes:

  • Results-driven, motivated, and capable of working independently and collaboratively.
  • Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills for engaging with candidates and colleagues.
  • Detail-oriented with strong administrative skills, ensuring accuracy in documentation and data entry.
  • Resilient, adaptable, and comfortable managing a fast-paced recruitment pipeline.


What We Offer:

  • Competitive base salary with extremely attractive commission scheme.
  • Comprehensive training and ongoing professional development.
  • An energetic, supportive team environment.
  • Opportunities for career growth within AMX Healthcare.
  • All paid trips abroad for top performers

title: Accountant
description:
Accountant

Join Trivium Group – Where Your Skills Drive Success!

At Trivium Group, we’re more than just a full-service Amazon agency—we’re a powerhouse of passionate experts helping brands scale profitably on Amazon. We work as an extension of our clients’ teams, providing top-tier strategic growth solutions without the hefty price tag. Our company thrives on strong systems, sharp people, and solid values—and now, we’re looking for an exceptional Accountant (Remote) to join our team!


Why Join Us?

✅ Competitive Salary – Based on experience and expertise

✅ Fully Remote – Work from anywhere with a reliable internet connection

✅ Semi-Flexible Hours Core hours: 9:00 AM-14:00 (Eastern Standard Time), with flexibility for the remaining 3 hours

✅ Paid Time Off – 36 PTO days/year

✅ Professional Growth – Develop your skills in a dynamic, international team


TO APPLY, YOU NEED TO CLICK ON THIS LINK & COMPLETE THE APPLICATION FORM


Your Role

As an Accountant at Trivium Group, you will play a crucial role in managing financial data, ensuring compliance, and optimizing financial processes. Your expertise will drive accuracy, efficiency, and financial health for our business.


Key Responsibilities

Reporting to the Head of Finance

Maintain and reconcile financial transactions, ensuring accuracy and compliance

Oversee accounts payable, receivable, and payroll (60+ employees)

Verify and record financial transactions in the correct accounts

Prepare monthly financial reports and adjustments

Monitor and report budget variances


What We’re Looking For

Mandatory: Accounting experience in a U.S. company

Proficiency in QuickBooks and Excel (a must!)

Mandatory experience in a service-based company with diverse pricing models and flexible payment structures

Fluency in English (B2 or higher)

Detail-oriented with strong analytical skills


Work Setup & Requirements

Full-time (40 hours/week)

Immediate Start Date

Quiet workspace with fast internet, webcam, and microphone

Autonomy & Ownership – You'll have the freedom to make an impact!


TO APPLY, YOU NEED TO CLICK ON THIS LINK & COMPLETE THE APPLICATION FORM

title: Staff Backend Engineer
description:
Você estará inserido em um ambiente onde nossos sistemas se integram de forma dinâmica, exigindo uma compreensão profunda da interligação entre negócios e serviços.


Suas principais responsabilidades incluem:

  • Desenhar e propor soluções de arquitetura que atendam às necessidades atuais e futuras da empresa, antecipando desafios de escalabilidade e impacto de longo prazo;
  • Atuar como um vetor de qualidade, promovendo boas práticas, cultura de testes (unitários, integração, e2e) e observabilidade (métricas, telemetria, SLOs e SLIs);
  • Monitorar os sistemas suportados pela Avenue, utilizando ferramentas como Prometheus, Datadog, Grafana e OpenTelemetry, além de garantir logs consistentes e acionáveis;
  • Influenciar a direção técnica da equipe e da organização, antecipando desafios e propondo soluções práticas e de alto impacto para o negócio da Avenue;
  • Desenvolver e orientar engenheiros em todos os níveis, promovendo o crescimento técnico do time por meio de mentoria e compartilhamento de conhecimento;
  • Fomentar uma cultura de decisões data-driven, utilizando métricas de engenharia (ex.: DORA) e dados de telemetria para embasar escolhas técnicas;
  • Colaborar na melhoria da experiência de desenvolvimento (DevEx), identificando gargalos e propondo iniciativas que otimizem a produtividade e a satisfação da equipe de engenharia.


Requisitos e qualificações

  • Experiência sólida com Golang , dominando conceitos como goroutines, channels e concorrência;
  • Vivência com Cloud GCP e Kubernetes , incluindo Helm Charts, Github Actions e gerenciamento de infraestrutura como código;
  • Familiaridade com bancos de dados como MySQL , Postgres , Elasticsearch e Datastore , além de soluções de cache como Memcached ;
  • Conhecimento em comunicação entre serviços via RabbitMQ e gRPC ;
  • Expertise em boas práticas de testes (unitários, integração, e2e) e arquitetura de Microserviços , com ênfase no padrão Actor Model ;
  • Experiência com ferramentas de observabilidade como Prometheus , Grafana e OpenTelemetry para monitoramento e análise de sistemas;
  • Capacidade de avaliar impactos sistêmicos e propor soluções alinhadas aos objetivos estratégicos da empresa.


Diferenciais

  • Experiência prévia em iniciativas de Developer Experience (DevEx) , como automação de processos ou melhoria de pipelines de CI/CD;
  • Participação em sessões de calibração ou revisão técnica, fornecendo feedback construtivo para garantir decisões justas e consistentes.
  • Experiência com ferramentas de observabilidade, de mercado, como Prometheus, NewRelic, Dynatrace, Datadog.


Informações adicionais

BENEFÍCIOS DE SER UM COLABORADOR AVENUE

  • Regime CLT;
  • Vale refeição e vale alimentação atrativos;
  • Plano de saúde médico e odontológico;
  • Seguro de vida;
  • Wellhub ou TotalPass
  • Auxílio Home office (Política de work anywhere);
  • Vale cadeira (Pra deixar seu setup top ;P);
  • Equipamentos disponibilizados (Mac ou Dell);
  • Incentivo educacional (reembolso para cursos, certificações e eventos);
  • Bônus semestral (conforme regras formuladas pela Avenue);
  • 24 corretagens grátis e 50 operações com desconto no câmbio para operações de investimento no app da Avenue;
  • USD 100,00 depositados no primeiro salário para abrir sua conta na Avenue e começar a investir!

  • Colaborar na melhoria da experiência de desenvolvimento (DevEx), identificando gargalos e propondo iniciativas que otimizem a produtividade e a satisfação da equipe de engenharia.


Requisitos e qualificações

  • Experiência sólida com Golang , dominando conceitos como goroutines, channels e concorrência;
  • Vivência com Cloud GCP e Kubernetes , incluindo Helm Charts, Github Actions e gerenciamento de infraestrutura como código;
  • Familiaridade com bancos de dados como MySQL , Postgres , Elasticsearch e Datastore , além de soluções de cache como Memcached ;
  • Conhecimento em comunicação entre serviços via RabbitMQ e gRPC ;
  • Expertise em boas práticas de testes (unitários, integração, e2e) e arquitetura de Microserviços , com ênfase no padrão Actor Model ;
  • Experiência com ferramentas de observabilidade como Prometheus , Grafana e OpenTelemetry para monitoramento e análise de sistemas;
  • Capacidade de avaliar impactos sistêmicos e propor soluções alinhadas aos objetivos estratégicos da empresa.


Diferenciais

  • Experiência prévia em iniciativas de Developer Experience (DevEx) , como automação de processos ou melhoria de pipelines de CI/CD;
  • Participação em sessões de calibração ou revisão técnica, fornecendo feedback construtivo para garantir decisões justas e consistentes.
  • Experiência com ferramentas de observabilidade, de mercado, como Prometheus, NewRelic, Dynatrace, Datadog.

title: Segurança da Informação/Governança de TI – Analista Pleno
description:
Atividades:

  • Atuação em diversas frentes de Segurança da Informação, incluindo: análise de riscos, plataformas e projetos relacionados à área.
  • Gestão de identidades.
  • Administração de perfis de acesso com base na matriz de Segregação de Funções (SoD).
  • Atendimento e resolução de chamados relacionados à Segurança da Informação.
  • Análise de logs e eventos de segurança por meio de ferramentas SIEM.
  • Avaliação de riscos em redes, aplicações e ambientes em nuvem.
  • Produção e atualização de documentação técnica e procedimentos de Segurança da Informação.

Requisitos:

  • Graduação em andamento ou completa em Engenharia da Computação, Ciência da Computação, Sistemas de Informação ou áreas correlatas;
  • Experiência mínima de 2 anos na área de Segurança da Informação e/ou Redes de TI;
  • Vivência em áreas de TI, Telecom ou Segurança da Informação, como infraestrutura de redes, NOC ou SOC com conhecimento prático nas atividades descritas;


- Horário: 08:00 – 17:48h de seg. á sexta.

- Local de Trabalho: Campina do Siqueira (Curitiba).


- Empresa oferece: Vale transporte, Alimentação local, Assistência Médica, Assistência Odontológica, Programa Cashback, Convênio com Rede de Farmácia, Seguro de Vida.

title: Security Consultant
description:
Pay Rate: ~20-25/hr USD


Required Skills & Experience

  • 5 years of experience creating, structuring, testing, and troubleshooting new and existing code for adoption and configuration on Tanium or similar in an enterprise environment
  • Previous experience certifying configurations on end points in an IT and Cyber environment, supporting multiple global sites and devices
  • 2-3 years of experience building packages and sensors to bring visibility to end point data
  • Excellent documentation and solutions skills
  • Expert in cloud-native environments
  • Bilingual in English (written and verbal)


Job Description

Insight Global is seeking and International Remote Security Consultant to support a Cyber Security Tanium team's content management. This person will join a global ISRM Cyber Operations Technology team for a Fortune 50 Life Sciences and Manufacturing company. The team is working on migrating Tanium OT from VMware to a SaaS environment on AWS and on prem platforms to AWS. They have Tanium deployed across 80 global sites, 200k end points, and 200+ devices, so they are seeking an engineer to structure, test, and troubleshoot software solutions in order to manage and monitor devices in Tanium. They will be responsible for configuring and certifying end points as well as adoption and creation of new concepts for Tanium specific knowledge. Lastly, this person will come from a Cyber and IT background in order to feel confident navigating PCs and OS to retrieve data, visualize risk, and reverse engineer potential issues proactively and report findings to the team. To be successful, this person will come from a software environment, creating their own code and solutions, understand the value of documentation, and demonstrate previous successes managing a migration or expansion or solution end to end. Lastly, this person will have vulnerability, threat, and Red/Blue/Purple team experience, as this position sits on the Red Team Engineering. This position is fully remote.

title: Trade Finance Professionals
description:
About the Role:

Euro Exim Bank, an award-winning global financial institution is seeking freelance-based professionals who are truly Passionate About Sales. Your main task is to attract new clients involved in international trade such as exporters and importers by offering them our trade finance services such as Letters of Credit, Standby Letters of Credit and Bank Guarantees necessary for them to trade successfully in the global market.


Freelance basis only (this is NOT a permanent position)

Commission-based pay only (this is NOT a fixed salaried position)

Working from home from your country of residence (this is NOT an office-based position)

There is NO investment or fee required from you.


Benefits:

Working in your own leisure time at your own pace where there are no targets.

Setting your own goals, and your success is only limited by your enthusiasm and dedication to winning deals and bringing sales.

Receiving full support from the Bank throughout the entire sales process including regular lead generation in Brazil .

Ability to bring your own clients and contacts to earn higher commissions.

Expand your professional network

Ongoing delivery of high-quality training and trade finance product knowledge


Commission:

All members of our global sales team are given a commission scheme ranging from 6.5% to 15% on successful transaction volumes (terms & conditions apply). Your commission earnings will increase with your performance growth.


Requirements:

· 1+ years of experience in financial consultation, corporate advisory, corporate and institutional banking, business banking, or any related/similar sector

· An understanding of KYC, AML, and PEPs is advantageous

· A mobile phone, a PC with internal or external webcam capability and reliable internet


About Euro Exim Bank:

Headquartered in St. Lucia, West Indies, Euro Exim Bank is an award-winning international trade finance institution providing trade solutions for importers, contractors, and exporters. We have a Class ‘A’ international banking license from the Financial Services Regulatory Authority of St. Lucia (FSRA), a proud member of the Caribbean Association of Banks (CAB) and the International Chamber of Commerce (ICC).


The successful candidate will take initiative and be a self-starter and enjoy being part of a dynamic team. This role would ideally suit a diligent and reliable individual who is a team player with well-developed interpersonal skills.


Euro Exim Bank (Registered Office)

La Place Creole Building,

Rodney Bay, Gros Islet LC01 101

St. Lucia

+1 758 450 8349


Euro Exim Bank (Representative Office)

Suite 1C, 1 Oaks Court,

1 Warwick Rd, Borehamwood,

title: Analista de Sustentação Sênior (FullStack)
description:
A Keyrus acredita na diversidade e na inclusão. Encorajamos a todos a participarem em nosso processo de contratação, não importando o gênero, idade, raça, religião. Não permitimos nenhum tipo de discriminação. Isto é reforçado no processo de contratação e vivido dessa forma na empresa.

Sabemos que grandes resultados só são alcançados com uma grande equipe, por isso procuramos pessoas talentosas e apaixonadas, com desejo de crescer profissionalmente e criar uma trajetória de carreira conosco.

Estamos em busca de um Líder Técnico de Sustentação (FullStack) para integrar nossa equipe. Esse profissional será responsável por liderar tecnicamente as operações, gerenciar prioridades técnicas, garantir a eficiência das entregas, identificar e mitigar riscos, além de atuar como um ponto de conexão entre diferentes áreas da empresa.

O candidato ideal deve ter um sólido background técnico, habilidades de liderança e capacidade para conduzir análises, investigar e resolver incidentes em ambientes de produção. Além disso, será essencial implementar melhorias nos processos e garantir a adequada transição de conhecimento de sistemas em publicação.

Papéis e Responsabilidades

  • Liderar tecnicamente as atividades e gerenciar prioridades técnicas. Garantir a eficiência e qualidade das entregas técnicas.
  • Identificar e mitigar riscos operacionais.
  • Investigar e resolver requisições de serviço e incidentes em ambientes de produção, em colaboração com times operacionais e ferramentas de monitoramento.
  • Idealizar, conduzir e implementar melhorias e evoluções nos processos existentes.
  • Realizar transições de sistemas em fase de publicação junto aos times de desenvolvimento, absorvendo o conhecimento necessário para suporte em produção.
  • Avaliar e garantir que as soluções de monitoramento sejam adequadas para os sistemas em produção, incluindo novos sistemas.

Qualificações Essenciais

Horário de Trabalho:

  • Jornada no Horário da Europa Central (CET):
  • 05:00 - 14:00 (BRT) / 09:00 - 18:00 (CET).

Idiomas

  • Inglês avançado/fluente.

Requisitos Técnicos

Nuvem Pública (principalmente Azure):

  • Funcionamento básico e principais serviços (AKS, WebApp, Functions, ServiceBus, EventHub, SQL Database, CDN).
  • Análise de métricas de utilização/saturação e logs.
  • Interação entre serviços.

Banco De Dados

  • Microsoft SQL Server.
  • Redis.
  • MongoDB.

Backend

  • Java 11+.
  • Spring Boot.
  • Kubernetes.
  • EventHub/Kafka/RabbitMQ/ServiceBus.

Frontend

  • ReactJS.
  • JavaScript.
  • HTML.
  • CSS.

Qualificações Desejáveis

  • Experiência com práticas DevOps.
  • Conhecimento em Terraform/ARM.
  • Experiência com sistemas Unix/Linux.

Nossa missão é Auxiliar as empresas a extrair todo o potencial de Dados e Digital objetivando aumentar seu desempenho, ajudando na transformação, gerando novas alavancas de crescimento e competitividade.

Vem fazer parte do Time Keyrus!

Se você quiser saber mais sobre nós, convidamos você a visitar nosso site:

Desejamos boa sorte!

Sabemos que grandes resultados só são alcançados com uma grande equipe, por isso procuramos pessoas talentosas e apaixonadas, com desejo de crescer profissionalmente e criar uma trajetória de carreira conosco.

Estamos em busca de um Líder Técnico de Sustentação (FullStack) para integrar nossa equipe. Esse profissional será responsável por liderar tecnicamente as operações, gerenciar prioridades técnicas, garantir a eficiência das entregas, identificar e mitigar riscos, além de atuar como um ponto de conexão entre diferentes áreas da empresa.

O candidato ideal deve ter um sólido background técnico, habilidades de liderança e capacidade para conduzir análises, investigar e resolver incidentes em ambientes de produção. Além disso, será essencial implementar melhorias nos processos e garantir a adequada transição de conhecimento de sistemas em publicação.

Papéis e Responsabilidades

  • Liderar tecnicamente as atividades e gerenciar prioridades técnicas. Garantir a eficiência e qualidade das entregas técnicas.
  • Identificar e mitigar riscos operacionais.
  • Investigar e resolver requisições de serviço e incidentes em ambientes de produção, em colaboração com times operacionais e ferramentas de monitoramento.
  • Idealizar, conduzir e implementar melhorias e evoluções nos processos existentes.
  • Realizar transições de sistemas em fase de publicação junto aos times de desenvolvimento, absorvendo o conhecimento necessário para suporte em produção.
  • Avaliar e garantir que as soluções de monitoramento sejam adequadas para os sistemas em produção, incluindo novos sistemas.

Qualificações Essenciais

Horário de Trabalho:

  • Jornada no Horário da Europa Central (CET):
  • 05:00 - 14:00 (BRT) / 09:00 - 18:00 (CET).

Idiomas

  • Inglês avançado/fluente.

Requisitos Técnicos

Nuvem Pública (principalmente Azure):

  • Funcionamento básico e principais serviços (AKS, WebApp, Functions, ServiceBus, EventHub, SQL Database, CDN).
  • Análise de métricas de utilização/saturação e logs.
  • Interação entre serviços.

Banco De Dados

  • Microsoft SQL Server.
  • Redis.
  • MongoDB.

Backend

  • Java 11+.
  • Spring Boot.
  • Kubernetes.
  • EventHub/Kafka/RabbitMQ/ServiceBus.

Frontend

  • ReactJS.
  • JavaScript.
  • HTML.
  • CSS.

Qualificações Desejáveis

  • Experiência com práticas DevOps.
  • Conhecimento em Terraform/ARM.
  • Experiência com sistemas Unix/Linux.

Nossa missão é Auxiliar as empresas a extrair todo o potencial de Dados e Digital objetivando aumentar seu desempenho, ajudando na transformação, gerando novas alavancas de crescimento e competitividade.

Vem fazer parte do Time Keyrus!

Se você quiser saber mais sobre nós, convidamos você a visitar nosso site:

Desejamos boa sorte!

title: Desenvolvedor .NET Sênior
description:
Desenvolvedor .NET Sênior

Job Description

A Genesis Consulting tem oportunidade imediata para Desenvolvedores .NET experientes com verdadeira paixão por crescimento profissional e entrega de valor através da tecnologia. Nossos clientes são alguns dos principais líderes mundiais em diferentes indústrias e o candidato fará parte de projetos desafiadores para construir e apoiar soluções técnicas para suas necessidades.

Perfil técnico:

  • Sólidos conhecimentos em C#, .NET 3.5, .NET Core, .NET 6 ou superior
  • Conhecimentos em Oracle PL/SQL e Entity Framework
  • Bons conhecimentos em WebAPI, RestFul, Json, Angular
  • Bons conhecimentos em Microsserviços, Mensageria, Containers, Cloud
  • Conceitos de SOLID, TDD e BDD


Atuação:

  • Atuar em time Scrum com foco principal em desenvolvimento C# .net;
  • Entender as necessidades do cliente;
  • Auxiliar na definição dos requisitos para criação e manutenção de sistemas/produtos;
  • Participar ativamente do desenho das soluções

Atuação em um dos maiores players do mercado nacional

Regime de contratação: CLT Full + Pacote de Benefícios

title: Senior Backend (LLM) Engineer
description:
About Us

Founded in 2019 by two best friends, Jon and Eli, XILO set out to revolutionize the insurance industry by solving its biggest challenges. Eli, a brokerage owner, brought invaluable industry expertise, while Jon, an experienced software engineer, saw an opportunity to innovate using technology. Initially launched as a vertical SaaS solution addressing core quoting challenges, XILO has since evolved into a trailblazing Vertical AI company leveraging the latest AI technology to transform the industry. By layering cutting-edge AI solutions onto its SaaS platform, XILO is driving innovation far beyond its original vision. Having recently closed our Series A funding round, XILO is growing rapidly and seeking talented individuals who want to do career-defining work in a mission-driven startup that’s at the forefront of AI innovation.


About The Role

You’ll be designing and optimizing AI models, fine-tuning LLMs, OCR, and other AI-driven systems to streamline complex workflows and make insurance automation smarter, faster, and more reliable.

This isn’t just another ML role. We’re solving deep-rooted inefficiencies that insurance agencies have struggled with for decades—so much so that prospects have nearly teared up realizing how much time and effort our solutions will save them. Your work won’t be theoretical—it will directly transform the way thousands of businesses operate.


What You’ll Do:

  • Architect and develop scalable TypeScript microservices powering XILO’s platform.
  • Design and optimize workflows for AI-driven customer interactions with the help of integration and fine tuning LLMs.
  • Prepare datasets for LLM fine-tuning.
  • Optimize system performance, reliability, and scalability.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams (product, frontend, data science) to deliver seamless integrations.
  • Mentor and guide junior engineers, fostering a collaborative and growth-oriented team culture.
  • Implement best practices for API security, data privacy, and maintainability.


What we’re looking for

  • 7+ years of backend engineering experience, with at least 2 years of expertise in TypeScript/Node.js.
  • Deep understanding of microservices architecture and cloud-based deployment (AWS, Heroku).
  • Deep understanding of Postgres database architecture and design.
  • Proven experience with scalable API design and database optimization.
  • Experience in fine-tuning and integration with LLMs (ChatGPT, ClaudeAI, Llama, etc.)
  • Experience in gathering datasets for LLM fine-tuning.
  • Passion for writing clean, maintainable, and testable code.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced startup environment.
  • A collaborative mindset with a willingness to mentor and learn from others.


What we offer

  • Collaborative and innovative work environment.
  • Flex PTO for any reason, including sick days (no specified limits), flexible work schedule.
  • Personal laptop.
  • Health and wellness package.
  • Budget for English lessons.


You’ll have the opportunity to specialize in:

  • AI Agents – The core of our automation strategy, building AI-driven workflows that replace tedious, manual processes with seamless decision-making
  • LLM & Model Fine-Tuning – Adapting models to understand and process insurance-specific language and workflows with high accuracy
  • OCR & Document Intelligence – Extracting, structuring, and analyzing critical insights from a wide range of insurance documents
  • Intelligent Data Mapping – Training models to aggregate, categorize, and link scattered data into a centralized, dynamic user profile


Why Join XILO?

  • A great tech startup – Small, fast-moving, and driven by real impact
  • Endless career growth – Help shape the team, tech, and company as we scale
  • Strong leadership & backing – Work alongside experienced founders and tier 1 silicon-valley VCs
  • Real-world data at scale – Work with rich, high-quality datasets collected from hundreds of insurance agencies , providing a strong foundation for AI fine- tuning, automation, and decision-making models

title: Analista de Pré-Vendas/ Soluções
description:
A Foursys é um time apaixonado por inovação, design e transformação digital.

Somos globais, somos GPTW.

‍ ♿️ Na Foursys, celebramos a diversidade e acreditamos que são as diferentes ideias e perspectivas que nos enriquecem. Portanto, sua cor, religião, gênero, raça, nacionalidade, idade, origem, identidade de gênero, deficiência ou orientação sexual não são barreiras para se juntar à nossa equipe. #VemSerFoursys!

Que tal se juntar a nós e se tornar um(a) #FourTalent?

Conhecimento técnico:

  • Análise de processos de negócios;
  • Análise de requisitos;
  • Discovery.

Responsabilidades

  • Tratar os requisitos do projeto;
  • Gerar solução do projeto;
  • Desenhar as bases de dados conforme modelo de dados estabelecido e seus respectivos acessos;
  • Gerar especificações, protótipos, fluxos e outros artefatos necessários para desenvolvimento dos requisitos;
  • Orientar e acompanhar o processo de construção do sistema.

Formato de Trabalho

Remoto.

E temos o Clube da Four que oferece ótimas vantagens!

title: Senior Domain Architect
description:
Team Function:

Designs and develops Data/Domain IT architecture (integrated process, applications, data and technology) solutions to business problems in alignment with the Enterprise Architecture direction and standards. Requires in-depth logical and practical knowledge in Data Architecture and basic knowledge of related job disciplines. Has knowledge of best practices and how own area integrates with others; is aware of the competition and the factors that differentiate them in the market.

Role Description:

  • Utilizes in-depth conceptual and practical knowledge in Domain Architecture and basic knowledge of related job disciplines to perform complex technical planning, architecture development and modification of specifications for Domain solution delivery.
  • Solves complex problems and partners effectively to execute broad, continuous Domain level architecture improvement roadmaps that impacts the organization.
  • Works independently, receives minimal guidance and direction to solve for and influence Enterprise and System architecture through Domain level knowledge. Reviews high level design to ensure alignment to Solution Architecture.
  • May lead projects or project steps within a broader project or may have accountability for on-going activities or objectives. Mentor developers and create reference implementations/frameworks. Partners with System Architects to elaborate capabilities and features.
  • Delivers single domain architecture solutions and executes continuous domain level architecture improvement roadmap. Actively supports design and steering of a continuous delivery pipeline. Plans Architecture runway for a full solution and fosters built-in quality for entire solution. Establishes and supports definition of Non-Functional requirements.


Requirements:

Data & Analytics Technologies experience

•Hands-on experience in building data assets on Snowflake, RedShift, Databricks, etc.

•Experience in Cloud Infrastructure (data and analytics focused) such as AWS (Athena, EMR, Glue, S3), Azure (Azure Data Fabric, Power BI) and GCP (BigQuery).

•Experience in Integration technologies such as Informatica, Matillion, FiveTran, AWS Glue, etc.

•Experience in Reporting technologies such as PowerBI, Tableau, etc.

•Knowledge in Data Governance tools

•Knowledge in Master Data Management solutions

Architecture Experience

•Ability to articulate various Data Architecture styles such as Data Mesh, Data Fabric, Medallion Architecture, etc.

•Experience in creating strategy, Vision, Roadmap, Reference Arch and patterns for a business/technical capability

•Experience in performing technology evaluations and recommend tools

•Experience in evaluating vendor’s product and ensure it aligns to company’s requirements (not influenced by vendors)

•Experience in developing Data Architecture guidelines

•Gain alignment on solutions and ability to influence others with data points

Insurance Domain Experience

•Strong understanding of Insurance domains such as UW (Policy), Claims processing, Services Operations, etc.

•Knowledge on legal and compliance regulations specific to Insurance

•Experience in building end to end data pipelines for insurance domains such as Product, Claims, Billing, Finance, Distribution


Other Critical Skills

  • Data architecture - Advanced
  • Data Lakehouse - Intermediate
  • Data Warehouse - Advanced
  • Data Governance - Intermediate
  • Cloud data platforms - Advanced
  • Data Integration Tools - Advanced
  • Data Modeling - Intermediate
  • Data Strategy and Roadmap - Intermediate
  • AI & ML - Intermediate
  • Master Data Management - Intermediate
  • Operational Data Management - Intermediate

Software / Tool Skills

  • Snowflake - Intermediate (4-6 Years)
  • Databricks - Entry Level (1-3 Years)
  • AWS Cloud - Intermediate (4-6 Years)
  • Power BI - Intermediate (4-6 Years)
  • ETL Tools - Advanced (7+ Years)
  • Sagemaker - Intermediate (4-6 Years)


Benefits:

This position comes with competitive compensation and benefits package:

  • Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses
  • Comprehensive benefits package
  • Home Office model
  • Career development and training opportunities
  • Flexible work arrangements (remote and/or office-based)
  • Dynamic and inclusive work culture within a globally known group
  • Private Health Insurance
  • Pension Plan
  • Paid Time Off
  • Training & Development
  • *Note: Benefits differ based on employee level

About Capgemini

Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided everyday by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of over 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong 55-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data, AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group €22.5 billion in revenues in 2023.

title: Senior PostgreSQL Database Administrator (DBA) (with Azure, AWS and GCP)
description:
Project Description:

Our Client is one of the largest CPG companies is modernizing their IT landscape towards Cloud infrastructure. As part of this program multiple applications are impacted with strategic changes across portfolio. We are looking for strong DBA to support program with the Postgre SQL experience to join our team of professional engineers across the globe.


Responsibilities:

• Google knowledge on Azure, AWS, and Google Cloud technologies.

• Familier on PostgreSQL provision, configuration and management.

• Creating database objects (triggers, indexes, etc.)

• Monitoring and ensuring database performance in cloud environments.

• Identifying potential issues with the database and resolving them in a timely manner to ensure optimal performance and reliability.

• Ensuring the maintenance of backups and conducting disaster recovery operations in accordance with business requirements and standards.

• Monitoring security and preventing unauthorized access and follow compliance procedures.

• Scheduling server maintenance in accordance with business requirements, after coordinating with all relevant stakeholders to ensure minimal disruption and optimal timing.

• Providing best practice guidance to the development/application/stake holders.

• Resolving production data issues as per given SLA timeline to avoid major incidents.

• Managing tablespaces and roles as per given security standards.

• Developing automation technologies for data loading and data refresh activities.

• Database Migrations between cross platforms (Oracle, MS SQL and DB2) into Multi Cloud (Azure, AWS and GCP) PostgreSQL database technology.

• Ensuring data integrity and managing user access and permissions as per the organization standards.

• Using utilities like PgAdmin4, Azure Data studio and psql for database maintenance.


Mandatory Skills Description:

• A minimum of 5 years of experience is required in PostgreSQL database technology, specifically with multi-cloud environments including Azure, AWS, and GCP tenants.

• Proven previous experience as a PostgreSQL DBA or similar role.

• In-depth understanding of database management and security.

• Strong problem-solving and communication skills.


• Responsible for managing a firm's PostgreSQL databases in multi-cloud environments (Azure, AWS, and GCP), ensuring smooth operation and functionality to meet business goals. Experience in optimizing database performance, managing database issues and backups for point-in-time recovery, disaster recovery, and monitoring security and access management as per business requirements.

• Experience in Multi Cloud tenant(Azure, AWS, and GCP) to provision the PostgreSQL PaaS solution and configure as per security standards.

• Experienced in database migrations across platforms from legacy databases (SQL, Oracle, and DB2) to multi-cloud PostgreSQL PaaS databases.

• Understanding access management to ensure database security. This includes controlling who can access the database and to what extent, as well as removing inactive users when necessary.

• Problem-solving is another crucial soft skill. Given that troubleshooting is a key responsibility, the candidate must be adept at identifying and addressing potential issues swiftly. They should be capable of devising quick and effective solutions to resolve these problems efficiently.

• Effective communication skills are crucial for collaborating with the application team and stakeholders to comprehend business requirements and deliver DBA support during AMS working hours. This involves actively engaging with team members and stakeholders to ensure clear understanding and alignment on project goals. Additionally, providing timely and efficient DBA support during AMS working hours is essential for maintaining smooth operations and addressing any issues that may arise.

• PostgreSQL DBA (Database Administrator) is responsible for managing and optimizing the PostgreSQL database system on multi-cloud (Azure, AWS, and GCP) tenant and provide support on AMS working hours.


Nice-to-Have Skills Description:

Bachelor's degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.

•Multi Cloud (Azure/AWS/GCP) Certified Professional.


Languages:

English: B2 Upper Intermediate

• Ensuring the maintenance of backups and conducting disaster recovery operations in accordance with business requirements and standards.

• Monitoring security and preventing unauthorized access and follow compliance procedures.

• Scheduling server maintenance in accordance with business requirements, after coordinating with all relevant stakeholders to ensure minimal disruption and optimal timing.

• Providing best practice guidance to the development/application/stake holders.

• Resolving production data issues as per given SLA timeline to avoid major incidents.

• Managing tablespaces and roles as per given security standards.

• Developing automation technologies for data loading and data refresh activities.

• Database Migrations between cross platforms (Oracle, MS SQL and DB2) into Multi Cloud (Azure, AWS and GCP) PostgreSQL database technology.

• Ensuring data integrity and managing user access and permissions as per the organization standards.

• Using utilities like PgAdmin4, Azure Data studio and psql for database maintenance.


Mandatory Skills Description:

• A minimum of 5 years of experience is required in PostgreSQL database technology, specifically with multi-cloud environments including Azure, AWS, and GCP tenants.

• Proven previous experience as a PostgreSQL DBA or similar role.

• In-depth understanding of database management and security.

• Strong problem-solving and communication skills.


• Responsible for managing a firm's PostgreSQL databases in multi-cloud environments (Azure, AWS, and GCP), ensuring smooth operation and functionality to meet business goals. Experience in optimizing database performance, managing database issues and backups for point-in-time recovery, disaster recovery, and monitoring security and access management as per business requirements.

• Experience in Multi Cloud tenant(Azure, AWS, and GCP) to provision the PostgreSQL PaaS solution and configure as per security standards.

• Experienced in database migrations across platforms from legacy databases (SQL, Oracle, and DB2) to multi-cloud PostgreSQL PaaS databases.

• Understanding access management to ensure database security. This includes controlling who can access the database and to what extent, as well as removing inactive users when necessary.

• Problem-solving is another crucial soft skill. Given that troubleshooting is a key responsibility, the candidate must be adept at identifying and addressing potential issues swiftly. They should be capable of devising quick and effective solutions to resolve these problems efficiently.

• Effective communication skills are crucial for collaborating with the application team and stakeholders to comprehend business requirements and deliver DBA support during AMS working hours. This involves actively engaging with team members and stakeholders to ensure clear understanding and alignment on project goals. Additionally, providing timely and efficient DBA support during AMS working hours is essential for maintaining smooth operations and addressing any issues that may arise.

• PostgreSQL DBA (Database Administrator) is responsible for managing and optimizing the PostgreSQL database system on multi-cloud (Azure, AWS, and GCP) tenant and provide support on AMS working hours.


Nice-to-Have Skills Description:

Bachelor's degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.

•Multi Cloud (Azure/AWS/GCP) Certified Professional.


Languages:

English: B2 Upper Intermediate

title: Desenvolvedora FullStack
description:
Responsibilities and assignments Como pessoa engenheira fullstack , você fará parte do nosso time de desenvolvimento, trabalhando em um squad multidisciplinar  para construir soluções de ponta a ponta. Desde as primeiras conversas com os times de produto e design até o monitoramento da funcionalidade em produção, você terá autonomia para propor novas arquiteturas, metodologias e melhorias que elevem a qualidade da nossa plataforma.
Nossa stack combina Elixir e Phoenix no backend,  com GraphQL como ponte entre frontend e backend, além de React e React Native no frontend . No front, trabalhamos com TypeScript/JavaScript ES6/ES7, Context API e buscamos constantemente otimizar a performance e estabilidade das interfaces.
Não exigimos experiência prévia com Elixir ou Phoenix —se ainda não conhece, terá espaço para aprender por aqui! O mais importante é sua proatividade, autonomia e vontade de construir soluções escaláveis e eficientes. Se quiser contribuir mais no backend ou no frontend, nós apoiamos!
Aqui, prezamos por pessoas antes de processos e valorizamos quem pensa além do código. Se você gosta de desafios e tem vontade de transformar, vem com a gente! ??
Alguns exemplos de desafios técnicos que você pode encontrar no seu dia-a-dia aqui:
  • Desenhar uma plataforma genérica de gamificação dos nossos produtos
  • Refatoração do sistema de usuários e grupos para melhor atender os novos requisitos
  • Implementar novas funcionalidades que ajudem nossos usuários a lerem mais livros
  • Implementar testes que nos ajudem a entender o comportamento de nossos usuários
  • Nos ajudar a quebrar nosso monolito em partes menores
Além dos desafios técnicos, também esperamos que você ajude a elevar a qualidade técnica da equipe e do nosso código, através de:
  • Reviews de código
  • Mentoria de seus colegas
  • Identificação de problemas e melhorias nos nossos códigos e sistemas
  • Proatividade para implementar melhorias nos nossos sistemas
  • Colaboração de conhecimento através de discussões síncronas ou assíncronas
Requirements and qualifications
  • Experiência em React.js.
  • Experiência com TypeScript.
  • Conhecimento em HTML, CSS e pré-processadores.
  • Gerenciamento de estado com Context API e Redux. 
  • Styled components (estilização de componentes)
  • Experiência em desenvolvimento de aplicações responsivas.
  • Familiaridade com controle de versão (Git).
  • Conhecimentos em testes automatizados (Jest é uma vantagem).
  • Boas práticas de desenvolvimento.
  • Habilidades de solução de problemas e depuração.
  • Boas habilidades de comunicação e trabalho em equipe.

title: Especialista em WFM Bilíngue
description:
Vaga de Especialista de WFM - Home Office


Quem somos?

Somos fanáticos por nossas pessoas! E demonstramos isso oferecendo uma cultura de pertencimento; caminhos claros para o desenvolvimento de carreira; programas de apoio profissional, coaching e mentoria, uma rede global de amigos e colegas que podem te suportar e mais! (Tipo, muito mais.).


Quer estar em uma multinacional que é Great Place to Work, apoiar as melhores marcas do mercado, inovar e mudar o mundo – tudo ao mesmo tempo em que estabelece conexões reais com as pessoas e desenvolve sua carreira? Seja um #gamechanger


O que você fará:


  • Apoiar a equipe de WFM na utilização do ECP;
  • Liderar as reuniões semanais da equipe de suporte do ECP;
  • Implementação e transição de novos projetos;


Se você:


  • Possui experiência em BPO’s.
  • Possui inglês nível C2.
  • Tem habilidades avançadas em Microsoft Office (Excel e PowerPoint são essenciais).
  • Tem ensino superior completo.
  • Possui equilíbrio emocional e foco em melhoria contínua.
  • É habilidoso no gerenciamento de conflitos.


Aqui é o seu lugar!


Todas as vagas da Concentrix vagas são elegíveis a Pessoas com Deficiência.

title: Sales Executive (SDR Inglês Fluente)
description:
Sales Executive (Inglês Fluente) | Posição de Longo Prazo em Empresa Americana



A Blue Dot conecta talentos a oportunidades internacionais de alto nível.

Com mais de 10 anos de experiência em soluções de staffing para empresas dos Estados Unidos, buscamos profissionais ambiciosos para posições de destaque no mercado global. Hoje, representamos um cliente sediado na Flórida que procura um Sales Executive com fluência em inglês, perfil consultivo e foco em performance para atuar na gestão e expansão de carteira de clientes B2B.


Responsabilidades:


  • Gerenciar um portfólio de clientes norte-americanos, conduzindo negociações B2B de alto valor;
  • Executar estratégias de prospecção, relacionamento e fechamento de contratos;
  • Participar de reuniões e videoconferências com a liderança americana e clientes C-level;
  • Entender necessidades específicas de cada cliente, oferecendo soluções sob medida;
  • Manter dados e relatórios atualizados no CRM, com foco em indicadores de desempenho;
  • Cultivar relacionamentos sólidos e sustentáveis, assegurando a satisfação e retenção dos clientes.


Requisitos:


  • Mínimo de 6 meses de experiência em vendas (Sales Executive, BDR, SDR, Inside Sales ou similares);
  • Ensino superior completo ou cursando (modalidade EAD aceita);
  • Inglês fluente (comunicação será 100% em inglês, inclusive processo seletivo);
  • Comunicação clara, postura profissional e habilidade de conduzir conversas com decisores;
  • Equipamento adequado para videoconferências e uso de CRM (desejável ter dois monitores);
  • Traje business casual para reuniões virtuais com clientes.


Diferenciais:


  • Experiência prévia com vendas internacionais ou clientes dos EUA;
  • Vivência no uso de CRMs e ferramentas de produtividade remota.


Salário e Condições:


  • Remuneração: R$ 4.500,00 ;
  • Bonificação mensal em dólares, com base em performance;
  • Horário: Segunda a sexta-feira, das 12:00 às 21:00 BRT (1h de intervalo);
  • Posição 100% remota, com plano de carreira e oportunidades reais de crescimento.


Se você busca uma posição estável, com projeção internacional e espaço para crescimento profissional, candidate-se agora e avance para o próximo nível da sua carreira.

title: Analista de Pré-Vendas/ Soluções
description:
A Foursys é um time apaixonado por inovação, design e transformação digital.

Somos globais, somos GPTW.

‍ ♿️ Na Foursys, celebramos a diversidade e acreditamos que são as diferentes ideias e perspectivas que nos enriquecem. Portanto, sua cor, religião, gênero, raça, nacionalidade, idade, origem, identidade de gênero, deficiência ou orientação sexual não são barreiras para se juntar à nossa equipe. #VemSerFoursys!

Que tal se juntar a nós e se tornar um(a) #FourTalent?

Conhecimento técnico:

  • Análise de processos de negócios;
  • Análise de requisitos;
  • Discovery.

Responsabilidades

  • Tratar os requisitos do projeto;
  • Gerar solução do projeto;
  • Desenhar as bases de dados conforme modelo de dados estabelecido e seus respectivos acessos;
  • Gerar especificações, protótipos, fluxos e outros artefatos necessários para desenvolvimento dos requisitos;
  • Orientar e acompanhar o processo de construção do sistema.

Formato de Trabalho

Remoto.

E temos o Clube da Four que oferece ótimas vantagens!

title: Senior Domain Architect
description:
Team Function:

Designs and develops Data/Domain IT architecture (integrated process, applications, data and technology) solutions to business problems in alignment with the Enterprise Architecture direction and standards. Requires in-depth logical and practical knowledge in Data Architecture and basic knowledge of related job disciplines. Has knowledge of best practices and how own area integrates with others; is aware of the competition and the factors that differentiate them in the market.

Role Description:

  • Utilizes in-depth conceptual and practical knowledge in Domain Architecture and basic knowledge of related job disciplines to perform complex technical planning, architecture development and modification of specifications for Domain solution delivery.
  • Solves complex problems and partners effectively to execute broad, continuous Domain level architecture improvement roadmaps that impacts the organization.
  • Works independently, receives minimal guidance and direction to solve for and influence Enterprise and System architecture through Domain level knowledge. Reviews high level design to ensure alignment to Solution Architecture.
  • May lead projects or project steps within a broader project or may have accountability for on-going activities or objectives. Mentor developers and create reference implementations/frameworks. Partners with System Architects to elaborate capabilities and features.
  • Delivers single domain architecture solutions and executes continuous domain level architecture improvement roadmap. Actively supports design and steering of a continuous delivery pipeline. Plans Architecture runway for a full solution and fosters built-in quality for entire solution. Establishes and supports definition of Non-Functional requirements.


Requirements:

Data & Analytics Technologies experience

•Hands-on experience in building data assets on Snowflake, RedShift, Databricks, etc.

•Experience in Cloud Infrastructure (data and analytics focused) such as AWS (Athena, EMR, Glue, S3), Azure (Azure Data Fabric, Power BI) and GCP (BigQuery).

•Experience in Integration technologies such as Informatica, Matillion, FiveTran, AWS Glue, etc.

•Experience in Reporting technologies such as PowerBI, Tableau, etc.

•Knowledge in Data Governance tools

•Knowledge in Master Data Management solutions

Architecture Experience

•Ability to articulate various Data Architecture styles such as Data Mesh, Data Fabric, Medallion Architecture, etc.

•Experience in creating strategy, Vision, Roadmap, Reference Arch and patterns for a business/technical capability

•Experience in performing technology evaluations and recommend tools

•Experience in evaluating vendor’s product and ensure it aligns to company’s requirements (not influenced by vendors)

•Experience in developing Data Architecture guidelines

•Gain alignment on solutions and ability to influence others with data points

Insurance Domain Experience

•Strong understanding of Insurance domains such as UW (Policy), Claims processing, Services Operations, etc.

•Knowledge on legal and compliance regulations specific to Insurance

•Experience in building end to end data pipelines for insurance domains such as Product, Claims, Billing, Finance, Distribution


Other Critical Skills

  • Data architecture - Advanced
  • Data Lakehouse - Intermediate
  • Data Warehouse - Advanced
  • Data Governance - Intermediate
  • Cloud data platforms - Advanced
  • Data Integration Tools - Advanced
  • Data Modeling - Intermediate
  • Data Strategy and Roadmap - Intermediate
  • AI & ML - Intermediate
  • Master Data Management - Intermediate
  • Operational Data Management - Intermediate

Software / Tool Skills

  • Snowflake - Intermediate (4-6 Years)
  • Databricks - Entry Level (1-3 Years)
  • AWS Cloud - Intermediate (4-6 Years)
  • Power BI - Intermediate (4-6 Years)
  • ETL Tools - Advanced (7+ Years)
  • Sagemaker - Intermediate (4-6 Years)


Benefits:

This position comes with competitive compensation and benefits package:

  • Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses
  • Comprehensive benefits package
  • Home Office model
  • Career development and training opportunities
  • Flexible work arrangements (remote and/or office-based)
  • Dynamic and inclusive work culture within a globally known group
  • Private Health Insurance
  • Pension Plan
  • Paid Time Off
  • Training & Development
  • *Note: Benefits differ based on employee level

About Capgemini

Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided everyday by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of over 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong 55-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data, AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group €22.5 billion in revenues in 2023.

title: Desenvolvedor Full Stack .net
description:
Company Overview

SEW is the #1 Energy and Water Cloud Platform, providing cloud-based Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) solutions for Digital Customer Engagement, Field Workforce Engagement, and Smart AI/Machine Learning to the Energy and Utility sector. We empower utilities to enhance customer service, optimize operational efficiency, and maximize return on investments through the SEW platform applications leveraging mobile, AI, Machine Learning, and Cloud technologies.

Searching for your dream job? At SEW, we strive to help our employees find passion and purpose. Join us in changing the way the world uses energy and water and become part of our innovative and talented team!


Position Overview

We are looking for a Mid Level Full Stack .Net Developer with good experience with C# and Angular to join our dynamic engineering team. In this role, you will design, develop, and maintain robust web and mobile applications that integrate seamlessly with SEW’s platform. The ideal candidate will be passionate about building scalable and efficient software solutions and thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.


Key Responsibilities

Application Development:

  • Design, develop, and maintain scalable web and mobile applications using modern frameworks and technologies.
  • Build responsive front-end interfaces that deliver exceptional user experiences.
  • Develop efficient and secure back-end services and APIs.

Analysis and Reporting:

  • Perform thorough analysis of complex data and recommend actionable strategies.
  • Develop complex database queries in SQL/TSQL and NoSQL.
  • Translate client requirements to technical architectural specifications and communicate this to delivery teams and clients.

Collaboration:

  • Work closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, and other developers, to define and implement solutions.
  • Participate in code reviews to ensure high-quality software development.

System Optimization:

  • Optimize application performance to ensure scalability and reliability.
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve technical issues promptly.

Innovation and Best Practices:

  • Define data architecture requirements for cross-product integration within and across cloud-based platforms.
  • Stay up to date with emerging technologies and industry trends.
  • Advocate for and implement best practices in software development, including testing, security, and CI/CD processes.
  • Write test plans and test cases to ensure application integrity is maintained.


Education and Experience Requirements

  • Educational Background: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Data Engineering, or a related field.
  • Previous experience in software development and product deployment.
  • Hands-on experience with .Net Core, .Net Framework, Angular, Entity Framework, Git, Unit Tests and Pipelines.
  • Strong technical documentation skills.
  • Expertise in MySQL, Oracle, or MS SQL Server (SAP HANA is a plus).
  • Experience with cloud architecture, including AWS, Azure, and Google (SAP BTP is a plus).
  • Effectively translate data modeling and BI requirements into the design process.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent human relations and documentation skills.
  • Strong ability to interpret customer and market insights and conduct data analysis.
  • Fluent English is required; Spanish is a plus.


Why Join SEW?

  • Be part of a mission-driven organization creating impactful solutions for the energy and water sectors.
  • Collaborate with a talented and innovative team on cutting-edge projects.
  • Enjoy opportunities for professional growth and skill development.
  • Work in a culture that values diversity, creativity, and collaboration.


SEW is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, pregnancy, age, national origin, disability status, genetic information, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

  • Develop efficient and secure back-end services and APIs.

Analysis and Reporting:

  • Perform thorough analysis of complex data and recommend actionable strategies.
  • Develop complex database queries in SQL/TSQL and NoSQL.
  • Translate client requirements to technical architectural specifications and communicate this to delivery teams and clients.

Collaboration:

  • Work closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, and other developers, to define and implement solutions.
  • Participate in code reviews to ensure high-quality software development.

System Optimization:

  • Optimize application performance to ensure scalability and reliability.
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve technical issues promptly.

Innovation and Best Practices:

  • Define data architecture requirements for cross-product integration within and across cloud-based platforms.
  • Stay up to date with emerging technologies and industry trends.
  • Advocate for and implement best practices in software development, including testing, security, and CI/CD processes.
  • Write test plans and test cases to ensure application integrity is maintained.


Education and Experience Requirements

  • Educational Background: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Data Engineering, or a related field.
  • Previous experience in software development and product deployment.
  • Hands-on experience with .Net Core, .Net Framework, Angular, Entity Framework, Git, Unit Tests and Pipelines.
  • Strong technical documentation skills.
  • Expertise in MySQL, Oracle, or MS SQL Server (SAP HANA is a plus).
  • Experience with cloud architecture, including AWS, Azure, and Google (SAP BTP is a plus).
  • Effectively translate data modeling and BI requirements into the design process.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent human relations and documentation skills.
  • Strong ability to interpret customer and market insights and conduct data analysis.
  • Fluent English is required; Spanish is a plus.


Why Join SEW?

  • Be part of a mission-driven organization creating impactful solutions for the energy and water sectors.
  • Collaborate with a talented and innovative team on cutting-edge projects.
  • Enjoy opportunities for professional growth and skill development.
  • Work in a culture that values diversity, creativity, and collaboration.


SEW is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, pregnancy, age, national origin, disability status, genetic information, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

title: Azure Data Engineer
description:
Decskill, founded in 2014 as an IT Consulting Company, places paramount importance on its greatest asset: its people. Our main mission is to deliver value through knowledge and talent, and we achieve this by fostering a culture of excellence and investing in the development and well-being of our people. With over 600 dedicated professionals and offices in Lisbon, Porto, Madrid, and Luxembourg, Decskill operates across three core areas:


  • DECSKILL TALENT : We believe that our people are key to our success. Through Decskill Talent, we empower our team to embrace the digital transformation challenges of our clients. We collaborate with clients to drive innovation, ensuring project success and business growth.
  • DECSKILL BOOST : Equipping our team with the latest tools and methodologies, we optimize Time-to-Market and deliver innovative solutions exceeding client expectations.
  • DECSKILL CONNECT : Our team collaborates closely with clients to implement and manage IT infrastructures that generate long-term value.


At Decskill, we believe that by nurturing and empowering our people to confront the challenges of digital transformation, we create value not only for our clients but also for our entire ecosystem, fostering a digital community dedicated to growth and progress.


We are searching for an Azure Data Engineer !


Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and maintain data pipelines using Azure Data Factory (ADF) .
  • Implement and manage data storage solutions using Azure Data Lake Storage (ADLS) Gen 2.
  • Design, develop, and maintain data pipelines pipelines using Azure Synapse Analytics.
  • Utilize Azure Stream Analytics for real-time data processing and analytics.
  • Ensure data quality and integrity through effective data governance practices.
  • Implement CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps for automated build and deployment.
  • Collaborate with data analysts and other stakeholders to understand data requirements and deliver solutions that meet business needs.
  • Monitor and troubleshoot data pipelines to ensure optimal performance and reliability.
  • Stay up to date with the latest industry trends and best practices in data engineering and cloud technologies.


Requirements:

  • Experience with Azure Functions for serverless computing.
  • Knowledge of Azure Logic Apps for workflow automation.
  • Experience with Azure Stream Analytics for real-time data processing.
  • Familiarity with Azure API Management (APIM) for managing APIs.
  • Understanding of Microsoft Purview for data governance and compliance.
  • Proficiency in PySpark for data processing and transformation over either Spark.
  • Pool or using Azure data bricks
  • Strong experience with Azure Data Factory (ADF) for data integration and ETL processes.
  • Strong experience of Azure Synapse Analytics for ETL processes.
  • Expertise in Azure Data Lake Storage (ADLS) Gen 2 for scalable data storage.
  • Experience with CI/CD practices and tools, particularly Azure DevOps.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
  • Experience with Azure Functions for serverless computing. PLUS
  • Knowledge of Azure Logic Apps for workflow automation. PLUS
  • Experience with Azure Stream Analytics for real-time data processing. PLUS
  • Familiarity with Azure API Management (APIM) for managing APIs. PLUS
  • Understanding of Microsoft Purview for data governance and compliance. PLUS


If you’re interested in this job, please send your CV to or with reference “AzureDataEngineer”.


Thank You!

title: Social Worker
description:
**This job is in Ireland - you must be fluent in English - we can only accept applications from fully qualified social workers who are willing to relocate to Ireland - we will coordinate all visas, work permits etc**


GS International Recruitment is looking for a highly skilled and experienced Social Care Worker who will work with children/ young people, families and/ or significant others, Social Work teams, other healthcare providers agencies, schools, training agencies and community groups.


The Social Care Worker will care for, protect, and support vulnerable or dependent clients, individually or in groups, in conjunction with the wider multidisciplinary team and other relevant agencies. She/ he will ensure the welfare of those under his/ her care and will act as an advocate as appropriate.


The Social Care Worker will contribute to the planning and evaluation of individualised and group programmes of care, which are based on needs, identified in consultation with the client and others and delivered through day-to-day shared life experiences.


Within the Residential and Special Care Setting , the Social Care Worker will work as part of a team to provide a safe, caring environment for resident children/ young people with the primary aim of providing the intervention necessary to address the issues that are preventing them from living at home or in foster care, or to prepare them to live independently with the support of aftercare services.


Key Responsibilities:


Care and Support:

  • Ability to treat children/young people and their families with dignity, respect, and unconditional positive regard.
  • Plan, implement, and evaluate care plans, placement plans, and treatment programs.
  • Incorporate understanding of how previous life experiences impact children/young people into practice.
  • Engage in crisis management and physical intervention as per policy (e.g., Therapeutic Crisis Intervention).


Family and Community Engagement:

  • Work collaboratively with parents, families, and other agencies on behalf of the child/young person.
  • Participate in meetings regarding the care and development of children/young people.
  • Provide verbal and written feedback on the progress of children/young people.


Supportive and Advocacy:

  • Promote the rights, responsibilities, and welfare (physical, emotional, social, cultural, ethnic, spiritual) of each child/young person.
  • Encourage and support children/young people in community and family settings.
  • Form relationships and engage with traumatized children/young people.
  • Be a positive role model and advocate for children/young people's well-being.


Organizational and Management:

  • Undertake home management tasks such as budgeting, upkeep, cleaning, and hygiene.
  • Organize personal documents, information, and finances on behalf of children/young people.
  • Arrange age-appropriate activities and ensure the safety and risk assessment of children/young people on-site and during outings.


Educational and Developmental Support:

  • Promote attendance at school, training centers, medical, and clinical appointments.
  • Engage in age-appropriate play and activities with children/young persons.
  • Assist with transfer/referral to other services as needed.


Safety and Crisis Management:

  • Supervise children/young people during outings and maintain safety protocols.
  • Remain calm and manage oneself during volatile or potentially violent situations.
  • Report and respond to incidents promptly, including cases of absconding or abuse prevention.

The above Job Description is not intended to be a comprehensive list of all duties involved and consequently, the post holder may be required to perform other duties as appropriate to the post which may be assigned to him/her from time to time and to contribute to the development of the post while in office.

Must be willing to relocate to Ireland



Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Social Work, Psychology, Sociology, or related field (preferred).
  • More than 5 years of experience working in a residential care setting or with children and young people in a supportive capacity.
  • Knowledge of child development, trauma-informed care, and therapeutic interventions.
  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to build rapport and trust with residents and their families.
  • Ability to work effectively within a multidisciplinary team and collaborate with external agencies.
  • Commitment to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of children and young people.


Alternatively, please contact Rendy Mfene at if you have any questions!

title: Network Administrator
description:
A PrimeIT é uma empresa de referência, com 18 anos de experiência na prestação de serviços tecnológicos de IT, Telecomunicações e Engenharia.


Especializados em Team Extension, Managed Services, Custom Software e Nearshore, contamos actualmente com uma equipa de mais de 2360 profissionais que colaboram em projectos nacionais e internacionais nas mais diversas tecnologias.


Para este projeto estamos à procura de um Network Administrator (L3)!


Competências técnicas

Administração e Configuração de Redes

  • Gestão de serviços como DNS (Bind), DHCP, NTP e Proxy (Squid).
  • Configuração de roteamento estático/dinâmico (ip route, Quagga, FRRouting).
  • Gerenciamento de VLANs, link aggregation (bonding) e bridges.


Monitoramento e Diagnóstico

  • Ferramentas: netstat, ss, tcpdump, nmap, iftop, iperf, wireshark.
  • Diagnóstico com ping, traceroute, mtr.
  • Monitorização com Zabbix, Nagios, Prometheus + Grafana.


Segurança de Redes

  • Firewalls: iptables, nftables, firewalld.
  • Controlo de acesso: TCP Wrappers, hosts.allow/deny.
  • VPNs: OpenVPN, WireGuard, IPsec.
  • Hardening de serviços expostos.


Alta Disponibilidade e Balanceamento

  • HAProxy, Keepalived, LVS.
  • Clusterização com Pacemaker/Corosync.


Automatização

  • Scripts em Bash/Python para tarefas de rede e backups.
  • Integração com ferramentas de automação.


Ambientes Virtuais e Cloud

  • Redes em KVM, VMware, Proxmox.
  • Docker, Podman, Kubernetes.
  • Noções de redes em AWS, Azure e Google Cloud.


Requisitos obrigatórios:

  • Inglês: B2 ou C1
  • Linux


O que oferecemos?

  • Seguro de Saúde e outros benefícios.
  • Plano de Formação e Desenvolvimento.
  • Oportunidades de crescimento profissional.
  • Ambiente dinâmico e colaborativo.
  • Possibilidade de integrar projetos internacionais.
